He has requested a loan of 1,000 Peruvian Nuevos Soles to purchase spare parts for his vehicle so that he can generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for his vehicle.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad was born in 1994.  He lives in a sector in Jordan called Southern Ghour with his three siblings and his parents.  

For the past year, Mohammad has been trying his best to support his family financially by renting sound speakers for parties.  He started his business with only two sound speakers.  At this time, he needs to buy new party equipment to begin renting so that he can increase his profit.  But he does not have enough money to do so.  It is for this reason that he has applied for this youth loan.

loans.use: to buy new party equipment to rent.

loans.name: Maria Felicita

texts.es:
Maria tiene 37 años de edad vive en Union Libre tiene un 2 hijos vive con el compañero y con los hijos en Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Ríos. 

Es integrante de la ventanilla de la Virgen de Guadalupe que se encuentra ubicado en la parroquia Puerto Pechiche perteneciente al cantó Pueblo Viejo. Maria se dedica a la venta y ala siembra de maíz y arroz y a la crianza de pollos.

Solicita el crédito para el arriendo de terreno y la compra de insumos fertilizantes abonos insecticidas. La compra lo realiza en Ventanas y los vende en la misma localidad. Su sueño es mejorar los cultivos para tener mas ingresos y ayudar al estudio alos hijos.

Los desafios son las plagas y enfermedades como sinta roja que ataca a las hojas matando totalente a planta. En los tiempos libres le gusta cuidad a los hijos.
texts.en:
Maria is 37 years old and lives with her partner and two children in Ríos Province in Ventanas Canton.

She is a member of the Virgen de Guadalupe community bank located in the parish of Puerto Pechiche in Pueblo Viejo Canton. Maria makes a living selling and growing maize and rice, and rearing chickens. 

She is requesting the loan to lease land and buy inputs such as fertilizers, compost and insecticides. She will make her purchases in Ventanas and sells them in the same area. Her dream is to improve her crops to boost her earnings and help her children to study.

She faces challenges such pests and diseases such as "red stripe" which attacks the leaves and kills the plant completely. In her free time, she enjoys looking after her children.

loans.use: to buy inputs such as fertilizers, compost and insecticides.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm oil, salt, pepper, etc.  for her business.

loans.name: Gladys Patricia

texts.es:
La señora Gladys, tiene 39 años, es viuda desde agosto, tiene tres hijos una mayor de edad y dos de 13 y 15 años de edad y un nieto de dos años, vive en Puyo-Putuimi, dicha  zona es cálida- húmeda, es un sector con  variedad de vegetación, se dedica a la producción y venta de caña de azúcar (fruta) dicha actividad la realiza sola trabaja seis horas diarias todos los dias, el sueño de la señora fue ser profesora pero no tuvo el apoyo de sus padres y se caso a temprana edad y no pudo cumplir sus sueños, el propósito que tiene al solicitar el crédito es de mejorar su plantación con la compra de abono orgánico y una buena semilla de caña, para ofrecer a sus clientes producto de mejor calidad  e incrementar el ingresos para el estudio de sus hijos.
Gladys solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas y materia prima con el fin de mejorar su plantación y producir productos de calidad.
Gladys agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo recibido ya que gracias a estos fondos podrá cumplir sus metas a futuro.
texts.en:
Gladys, 39, has been a widow since August. She has three children, one grown, and two who are 13 and 15 years old. She has a two-year-old grandson. She lives in Puyo-Putuimi, an area that is hot and humid. It's an area with a variety of vegetation. She works growing and selling sugar cane. She does this by herself and works six hours every day. Her dream was to be a teacher, but she didn't have her parents' support and got married at a young age, so she was not able to achieve her dreams. Her goal is to improve her field by buying organic fertilizer and good sugar cane seeds so she can offer her customers a higher-quality product and increase her income for her children's studies.

Gladys seeks credit to buy seeds and raw materials with the goal of bettering her plantation and producing quality products. She gives thanks to Fundación Alternative and Kiva por the support given and is grateful for the funds in allowing her to complete her future goals.

loans.use: to buy seeds and raw materials for her sugar cane plantation

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wholesale fruits in order to make her breakfasts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy grocery store products such as sugar, rice, flour, etc.

loans.name: Glenda Rocio

texts.es:
En provincia de Manabí encontramos el cantón 24 De Mayo, aquí se reúne el Grupo De Crédito Nuevos Horizontes, es conocido por sus paisajes hermosos y por su gente trabajadora dedicada a la agricultura y cría de animales. 
En este lugar vive la señora Glenda, tiene 27 años de edad está casada y de esa relación tienen dos  hijos de 9 y 6 años  que estudian en escuela, su marido se dedica al comercio y  a la agricultura.
Doña Glenda para ayudarle a su marido con los gastos que genera el hogar desde hace varios años construyo una pequeña graja en la cual  se dedica a la cría de pollos y chanchos, ella compra los pollos pequeños en una distribuidora en la ciudad para luego alimentarlos y cuidarlos por tres meses hasta que estén grandes, luego los entrega a los comerciantes que llegan hasta su casa. Lo mismo lo hace con los chanchos, es así como ella se gana algo sin salir de su casa por el bienestar de su familia.
Este crédito es para comprar alimento y medicinas para los pollos y chanchos. Lleva 5 ciclos en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos siempre le son de mucha ayuda. Su sueño es darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The province of Manabí is located in the 24 De Mayo canton. This is where the Nuevos Horizontes credit group meets. The area is known for its beautiful landscapes and its hardworking people dedicated to agriculture and raising animals. 
This is where Ms. Glenda lives. She is 27 years old and married with two children, ages 9 and 6. Her children are in school, and her husband works in commerce and agriculture. 
To help her husband with the home expenses, Ms. Glenda built a small farm where she raises chickens and pigs. She buys small chickens from a distributor in the city and then feeds and cares for them for three months until they are large. Then she sells them to merchants who come to her house. She does the same thing with the pigs. That way she is able to make money for the well being of her family without leaving the house.
This loan is to buy food and medicine for the chickens and pigs. The credit group is in its fifth cycle, and Ms. Glenda likes it because the loans always help her a lot. Her dream is to give her children the best.

loans.use: to buy food and medicine for her chickens and pigs.

loans.name: Naida

texts.en:
Naida is a married woman, from Talibon, Bohol.  She has four grown children.  She runs a sari-sari (variety) store where she sells various items like soft drinks, noodles, condiments, coffee, sugar, soaps and biscuits. 

At present, Naida is in need of additional capital for her business.  Naida is requesting a loan in order to buy more stock including canned goods, noodles, soft drinks and detergents.  Through this loan, she will be able to improve the variety of merchandise she stocks thus allowing her to attract more buyers. 

Naida hopes to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, noodles, soft drinks and detergents.

loans.name: Naisoin's Group

texts.en:
Living in a rural area located in Kampong Cham province’s Ponhea Krek district, Naisoin, 38, has two children in total, both of whom are dependents. Naisoin and her husband are farmers who grow rubber to make a living. To better support her family, they also work for others for a fee. They have been in this business for 18 years.

Naisoin is a first-cycle client with VisionFund. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers for her rubber tree. She hopes this loan will enable her to grow her rubber in a timely way, so as to make a living better.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her rubber tree.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is a young Cameroonian, aged 30, single and without a child. He has been in this business for over five months, which makes him experienced. His business is likely to succeed because it is located in a semi-urban area with many animal farmers (potential customers). 

This loan will be used to increase his stock by forty percent.

loans.use: to buy dried ground shells for resale to animal farmers.

loans.name: Geghaznik

texts.en: Geghaznik lives in Dalarik village of Armavir region with his parents and sister. He owns a small garage where he provides vehicle repair service. This business has helped Geghaznik to sustain his family's living for the past four years. Now, by applying for this loan, Geghaznik is requesting financial support to be able to purchase materials and tools needed for providing vehicle repair service. (As this is Geghaznik's first loan it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who didn’t have access to credit products in the past because they have no credit history.) This loan will greatly assist Geghaznik to continue his business and he will be very grateful to lenders.

loans.use: to pay for materials and tools to be used in his vehicle repair business

loans.name: José Antonio

texts.es:
José de 43 años de edad, es un hombre honesto y trabajador, que por muchas limitantes en su niñez y adolescencia solamente pudo cursar tercer grado de educación básica. Actualmente, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y también, le ayuda en las labores agrícolas. Tienen tres hijos, los dos menores estudian y el mayor trabaja, es jornalero. 


José trabaja como agente de seguridad  desde hace 9 años, recibiendo como salario $233.00 por mes, estos ingresos no son  suficientes para cubrir las necesidades básicas del hogar, por ello trabaja también en la agricultura, cultiva maíz, frijol y hortalizas (repollo, tomate y chile). Estas actividades agrícolas, las aprendió desde muy pequeño gracias a que su padre le enseño.


El préstamo lo utilizara, para comprar materiales: laminas, madera, clavos y herramientas; ya que el techo de su viviendo se encuentra en mal estado y en la época lluviosa,  las consecuencias de vientos y goteras, le roban la tranquilidad a su familia. Es por ello, que aprovechando que se encuentran en la época seca, quiere reparar el techo y que su familia tenga las condiciones para habitar sin tener que estar preocupados cada vez que comienza a llover.
 

Además, de tener su vivienda en buenas condiciones quiere dedicarse de lleno al cultivo de hortalizas, ya que disfruta mucho haciendo estas labores y también por la oportunidad de negocio que ve en ello, hay gran demanda  y pocos productores se atreven a cultivar esto.
texts.en:
José is a 43 year old man who is honest and hard-working. Because of many limitations in his childhood and adolescence, he was only able to complete third grade. Now, he is married, and his wife takes care of the domestic tasks and also helps with the agricultural work. They have three children. The younger two study, and the oldest works as a hired hand. 


José has worked as an insurance agent for 9 years, making $233.00 per month. This income is not sufficient to cover his basic home needs, so he also works in agriculture. He grows corn, beans, and vegetables (cabbage, tomatoes, and chilies). He learned these activities at a very young age, thanks to his father teaching him.


José will use the loan to buy materials: tiles, wood, nails, and tools, since the ceiling of his home is in poor condition. In the rainy season, the consequences of the wind and rain rob his family of their tranquility. For this reason, he wants to take advantage of the dry season they are in to repair the ceiling so that his family will be able to live without being worried every time it starts to rain. 
 

In addition to having his house in good condition, José wants to dedicate himself to growing vegetables. He enjoys the work very much, as well as the business opportunity he sees in it. There is a great demand, and few producers dare to grow them.

loans.use: to buy materials: tiles, wood, nails and tools, since the ceiling in this home is in poor condition.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice and oil for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more women's accessories to resell.

loans.name: Javier

texts.es:
Javier (pictured with his wife)  es un cliente de Kubo Financiero y esta es su historia.

Me llamo Javier, tengo 55 años, estoy casado y tengo dos hijos, aunque solo uno depende de mi. Me dedico al comercio desde hace 40 años, inicie como chalan en un puesto de tacos, al principio yo limpiaba los platos. Después me case y decidí poner mi propio negocio donde vendo tacos de cabeza, mi esposa trabaja conmigo. Las ventas sonn buenas porqué estamos en una calle transitada.

Estoy pidiendo el prestamo para hacer más grande mi negocio y poder meter otros productos como tacos de suadero, longaniza y tripa. Mi lema, es "los tacos más baratos del rumbo y con buen sabor". Me consideró muy trabajador, responsable y comprometido.  Mis principales logros son haber sacado adelante a mi familia, mantener un negocio y construir una casa.
texts.en:
Javier (pictured with his wife) is a client of Kubo Financiero and this is his story. 

My name is Javier. I am 55 years old and married. I have two children but only one is dependent on me. I have been dedicated to business for 40 years. I started as an attendant at a taco stand. At first, I was washing the dishes. Later, I got married and decided to start my own business where I sell head tacos. My wife works with me. The sales are good because we are a busy street. 

I am requesting a loan in order to make my business bigger and to be able to offer more products like sweaty tacos, longaniza tacos and tripe tacos. My motto, is "The cheap tacos are good tasting". I consider myself very-hardworking, responsible and committed. My main achievements are to move my family forward, maintain a business and build a house.

loans.use: expand his food stand and buy more products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: improve her home.

loans.name: Omar

texts.en:
Omar is a 23-year-old single man from Jabalia city. He lives with his family in a small simple house. For the past six months, Omar has been working in his own stall where he sells grocery products. It is a good business and earns a good income. Omar would like to improve his stall and maybe in the future he will buy a small store. 

Omar took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy grocery products  to resell in his stall. This will increase his sales and also his income. 

Omar was photographed while he was working.

loans.use: to buy grocery products  for his stall

loans.name: Yousef

texts.en:
Yousef is a 22-year-old single man from Deir El Balah city. He lives with his family in a small simple house. For the past four years, Yousef has been working in his own stall where he sells grocery products. It is a good business and earns a good income. Yousef would like to improve his stall and maybe in the future he will buy a small store. 

Yousef took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy grocery products to resell in his stall. This will increase his sales and also his income. 

Yousef  was photographed while he was working.

loans.use: to buy grocery products  for his stall

loans.name: Faridun

texts.ru:
Фаридун житель района Восеъ. Ему 30 лет. Их в семье 8 человек, состоящей из него самого, жены, семилетнего сына, пятилетней дочери, родителей и двух братьев. У них большая и дружная семья. 
Фаридун вместе с братьями занимается животноводством, а именно купле-продажей крупнорогатого скота. Фаридун и его братья продолжают ремесло своего отца и начали этот бизнес самостоятельно 10 лет назад. Как видно это у них семейный бизнес и передается из поколения к поколению. Чтобы расширить бизнес и увеличить поголовье скота, Фаридун просит кредит в размере 1500 долларов США. Он очень надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
Faridun is thirty and lives in Vose. There are 8 people in his family, including himself, his wife, his 7 year old son, his 5 year old daughter, his parents and his two brothers. They have a large, happy family. 

Faridun and his brothers buy and sell cattle. They are continuing their father's trade and started their own business ten years ago. As you can see, it is their family business, passed on from generation to generation. Faridun requests a loan of $1500 to expand their business and increase the number of cattle. He is hoping for your support.

loans.use: to buy cattle for resale

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy farming supplies and two cuerdas of carrots.

loans.name: Kalsoom

texts.en:
Kulsoom is a 46-year-old married woman living with her husband and three children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her son drives a van which does not belong to him; he has to pay a daily fare to the van owner. A few days ago he was in a road accident while driving and the van was seriously damaged. The van owner is imposing a penalty on him which is out of his earning capacity. He wants to repair the van so that he can compensate the damages.

Therefore, Kulsoom has requested a loan from BRAC Pakistan which is the field partner of Kiva. Kulsoom hopes that through this amount her son will be able to repair the van and drive it again smoothly. Kulsoom belongs to a poor family, her son is the only single earning person and does not have any other source of income. Kulsoom seems very glad; she thanks Kiva and the field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to fix the passenger van used by her son.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es: Doña Gloria es una señora muy sonriente y muy amable, pero sobre todo muy trabajadora. Doña Gloria, o "La Chinita" (como la llaman) tiene 49 años de edad, es divorciada, tuvo tres hijos con su ex esposo aunque ahora ya solo una de sus hijas, que se encuentra estudiando la preparatoria, depende de la señora Gloria. La Chinita tiene una cocina de comida rápida desde hace ya 9 años. "Con mi separación, mi autoestima estaba muy mal, pero mi hermano fue quien me motivó para emprender un nuevo negocio. No me podía decidir ya que tenía la idea de iniciar una estética porque estudié cultura de belleza, pero tenia que invertir demasiado". El hermano de la Chinita siempre le decía que cocinaba muy rico y entonces el negocio fue una cocina económica. Sin embargo, también para iniciar el comedor tuvo que pedir prestado para comprar artículos indispensables, empezando por el establecimiento. El local era parte de la casa de los padres de La Chinita, que después paso a ser propiedad de su hermano y finalmente de Doña Gloria. La única dificultad que tiene que enfrentar es cuando los precios se disparan, no puede comprar todos los insumos necesarios para preparar sus alimentos y con esto Doña Gloria tiene pérdidas en su negocio, muchas veces no puede subir el precio de sus comidas a sus clientes. Doña Gloria esta solicitando un nuevo crédito para comprar insumos para sus alimentos, también comprará desechables, cazuelas, platos, vasos etc. Ella esta muy agradecida con KIVA y con VisionFund porque gracias a los créditos ha podido solventar los gastos de hogar y la educación de su hija para Doña Gloria es muy importante que su hija termine de estudiar una carrera profesional para que pueda mejorar su calidad de vida. En cuanto a la cocina económica, todo parece marchar bien "Creo que ayuda mucho el buen sazón que tengo para complacer el paladar de mis comensales". Uno de los sueños de Doña Gloria seria engrandecer su negocio “Me encantaría hacer mas grande mi cocina ya que es muy pequeña y muchas veces los comensales no caben en las mesas y se tiene que esperar para que yo los pueda atender, también me gustaría que mi hija terminara de estudia su carrera y llegara a ser una gran maestra; la voy a apoyar hasta donde yo pueda”
texts.en:
Gloria is a lady who is smiling, kind, and above all, very hardworking.  Doña Gloria, or “La Chinita”, as she is called, is 49 years old, and she is divorced.  She and her ex-husband have three children, but only one of them--a daughter who attends preparatory school--still depends on her. 

La Chinita has had a fast-food eatery for about 9 years now. She says: “Because of my separation, my self-esteem was very low, but my brother motivated me to start a new business.  I couldn’t decide, as I already had the idea of starting a salon, having studied at beauty school, but I would have had to invest too much."

Her brother had always told her that she cooked very well—so she decided that her business would be a home-style restaurant. However, in order to open the eatery, she had to seek a loan to purchase the items that were necessary to get it established.  It was located in her parents’ house, which later became her brother’s, and finally--hers. 

The only difficulty she faces is that when prices rise, she can’t purchase all of the supplies that she needs to prepare her food; and she suffers losses in her business, as often she cannot raise the prices of her meals for her customers.

Doña Gloria is seeking a new loan to purchase ingredients for her food, and she will also purchase take-out containers, pots, plates, cups, and similar items. 

She is very grateful to Kiva and to VisionFund, because thanks to their loans, she has been able to pay for her household expenses, and also for her daughter's education.  It is very important to Doña Gloria that her daughter finish studying for a professional career, so that she will be able to improve her quality of life.

Her home-style restaurant seems to be going well, and she says, "I believe my flavorful seasoning is a great help to me in pleasing my customers' palates"

One of her dreams is to expand her business:"I would love to make my restaurant bigger, as it is very small--often there is not enough room for my diners at the tables, and people have to wait for me to serve them. Also, I would like my daughter to complete her studies and become a great teacher. I'm going to support her as much as I can."

loans.use: to purchase sugar, salt, vegetables, plates, and similar items.

loans.name: Ma Remedios

texts.es:
Doña Remedios o Doña Reme, como le llaman, vive en un lugar que lleva el nombre de El Oro pues anteriormente se sacaba Oro de las minas, también es un lugar muy conocido por un vagón el cual funciona ahora como un restaurante. 

Doña Reme platica “Ese vagón solo fue un cachito del tren se quedo ahí pero ahora funciona como  restaurante la gente lo conoce muy bien, lo mejor del lugar son los ricos cafés”  Doña Reme es una mujer  muy trabajadora siempre muy alegre, tiene 46 años de edad está casada con el señor León desde hace 25 años, juntos han formado familia con tres niños uno de ellos aun se encuentra estudiando la secundaria. Doña Reme se dedica a la elaboración de uniformes escolares, desde hace ya 22 años. “Yo trabajaba con un señor que hacia uniformes por eso aprendí, después le enseñe a mi esposo y ahora sabe más que yo, nosotros iniciamos solo con una maquina sencilla, solo elaboramos vestiditos para niñas” argumentó la señora Reme,  poco a poco el taller de costura  fue creciendo gracias a los prestamos de otra financiera, cuando se entero de VisionFund y de KIVA decidió  cambiarse de institución y le ha ido mejor. Esta vez esta solicitando un crédito mas pequeño para volver a comprar mas tela, hilos y reparación de algunas maquinas  para la elaboración de sus uniformes pero también necesita de tela para seguir con la elaboración de sus pijamas. Sus clientes han quedado muy satisfechos con su trabajo por eso mismo el numero de sus clientes aumenta y también el trabajo. Sin embargo esta solicitando un crédito pequeño solo para comprar lo más necesario. Doña Remedios necesita trabajar muy fuerte para tener ingresos porque a mediados de año necesitara de dinero para volver a invertir en tela ya que es cuando tiene mas trabajo. Al parecer no enfrenta ninguna dificultad para sacar adelante su negocio aunque sí quisiera tener una bordadora para ya no tener que solicitar este servicio con otras personas. Este es el propósito de Doña Reme, hará un gran esfuerzo para comprar dicha bordadora y mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
Remedios or Reme, as they call her, lives in a place that carries the name El Oro because previously gold was extracted from the mines there. El Oro is also well-known for an antique train car that now functions as a restaurant. Reme says, "That was a tiny train that just sat there but now it functions as a restaurant that the people know well. The best part of this place are the delicious coffees."  

Reme is a hardworking woman who is always very cheerful. She is 46 years old and has been married to León for 25 years. Together they have formed a family with three children. One of their children is still in high school. Reme has made a living making school uniforms for 22 years. “I used to work with a man who made uniforms, so I learned from him. Later, I taught my husband and now he knows more than I do. We began with just one simple machine and we only made uniforms for girls." said Reme. Little by little, the sewing shop grew, thanks to loans from another lender. When Reme found out about VisionFund and Kiva, she decided to switch institutions and things have gone better for her. This time, she is requesting a smaller loan so that she can buy more fabric and thread, as well as repair some machines that she uses to make uniforms. She also needs fabric in order to keep making pajamas. Her clients have been very satisfied with her work. That is why her customer base has grown, along with her workload. Nevertheless, Reme is requesting a small loan to buy the supplies she needs. She needs to work very hard to generate income because halfway through the year she will need to invest again in fabric when she is busiest. 

Reme doesn't seem to be facing any difficulties in moving her business forward, although she would like to get a machine to sew borders so that she does not have to hire others to do this job. Reme will work very hard to purchase said machine and improve her business.

loans.use: to buy fabric, stockings, threads, buttons etc.

loans.name: Gabil

texts.en:
Gabil is a car mechanic. He is married and has two children. One of his children is in eleventh class at school and does preparation for the Academy of Art. His other child does sports. He studies in the ninth grade. Gabil’s wife is a housewife. They are IDPs (Internally Displaced Persons) from Fuzuli city, now living in the Baku region. 

It’s noted that Gabil is a car mechanic, and he has an auto repair area. Today he needs a loan in the amount of 2,000 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat) to buy spare car parts. Gabil says he is thankful to Kiva organization for its help. In the future, he wants to give a good education to his children.

loans.use: to buy spare car parts.

loans.name: Lucienne

texts.en: Lucienne is a Cameroonian woman, aged fifty.  She is married with five children, the oldest is thirty living independently while the youngest is sixteen in high school. She has been in this business for over two years which makes her experienced and stable.  Her business is likely to succeed because it is located in an urban area with many potential customers. She will use this loan to increase her turnover by forty five percent.

loans.use: to buy stuff (bread, salt, soap, toilet paper rolls, sugar, rice, etc.) for resale

loans.name: Khader

texts.en:
Khader is a 50-year-old divorced man from a small village near Nablus city. He lives with his son in a small simple house. For the past twelve years, Khader has been working in his own grocery store. It is a good business and earns a good income. Khader would like to improve his store but he has no money for it.

Khader took a USD loan from FATEN (Palestine for Credit & Development). This loan will help him to buy grocery products and apply more shelves for his stall to resell. This will increase his sales and also his income. 

Khader appears (while he was working) in the photo.

loans.use: to buy grocery products and apply more shelves for his stall to resell.

loans.name: Ansam

texts.en:
Ansam  is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in the photo.

Ansam is a 32-year-old married woman from Gaza City. She lives with her husband and three daughters in a small simple house. For the past three years, Ansam's husband has been working in his own grocery store.  It is a good business and earns a good income. Ansam and her husband would like to improve their store but they have no money for it.

Ansam  took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her and her husband to buy grocery products and supply more shelves for their store to resell.  This will increase the sales and also the income.

loans.use: and her husband buy grocery products and supply more shelves in their store to resell

loans.name: Seham

texts.en:
Seham is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in the photo.

Seham is a 44-year-old married woman from Jabalia city. She lives with her husband and four kids; two sons and two daughters in a small simple house. For the past five years, Seham's husband has been working in his own grocery store . It is a good business and earns a good income. Seham and her husband would like to improve their store but they have no money for it.

Seham took a USD loan from FATEN (Palestine for Credit & Development). This loan will help her and her husband to buy grocery products and apply more shelves in their store to resell. This will increase sales and also their income.

loans.use: to help her and her husband to buy grocery products and apply more shelves in their store to resell.

loans.name: Rafik

texts.en:
Rafik lives in Miasnikyan village of the Armavir region. He lives together with his father, brother, wife and 2-year-old son. Rafik and his father keep livestock, including cows, sheep, pigs and chickens. They also own an arable land where they cultivate tomatoes. Agriculture is the only source of income for this family and that's the reason Rafik works hard to sustain his family. He has now applied for this loan to be able to increase his livestock by 3 more oxen and purchase forage to feed the livestock. The loan will be a huge support for his farm and Rafik will be very grateful to lenders. 

As this is Rafik's first loan, it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who do not have access to credit products before because they have no credit history.

loans.use: to pay for 3 oxen and forage to feed the livestock

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy traditional embroidered blouses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm oil, vita, and pepper for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Rani

texts.en: Rani is a 32-year-old married woman. She has been doing a business selling crockery for many years with the support of her husband who is also shown in the photo.  They offer various types of crockery such as glasses, cups, bowls etc. Her husband assists her in selling the items to the people of their community and in the local market. They make a sufficient amount of income to contribute to the family income. For the improvement of their business, Rani contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of Rs 40,000. In this way, she would be able to purchase more varieties of crockery such as mugs, bowls and glasses in various sizes and designs. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more varieties of crockery to sell

loans.name: Nazeeran Bibi

texts.en:
Nazeeran bibi is the age of 46 and lives in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is married and the mother of six children. She is a housewife and looks after her family. Her children are in the student life. Only her husband earns for the whole family. Her husband works in the furniture-making field. He has been running his own furniture-making shop. He makes different designs of furniture items, and his furniture items are popular. He is in need of some new supplies, such as wood, a wood-cutting machine, nails, polish, etc., to improve his woodwork. 

Last year Nazeeran bibi received a loan and invested in the furniture shop. Her husband was able to better his work. Now again, Nazeeran bibi requested a loan for her husband so that he can buy raw material for furniture. As per her previous loan repayment behavior, she has proved herself a regular, honest and punctual client.

Nazeeran bibi is very thankful to Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy raw material for woodwork and furniture

loans.name: Hanadi

texts.en:
Hanadi is 35-years-old.  She lives with her husband in Nablus.  Nablus is a city in the northern West Bank, approximately 49 kilometers north of Jerusalem, with a population of 126,132.

Hanadi is asking Ryada for this loan to paint her house and structure doors and windows, which will help to warm her house especially now in the winter. She is very grateful to everyone.  The one who appears in the photo is her husband.  For cultural reasons she cannot publish her photo online, so she apologies.

loans.use: to paint her house and structure doors and windows

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, palm oil, vita, pepper, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Artak

texts.en: Artak lives in Lernagog village in the Armavir region. He lives there with his wife and two sons. His elder son currently serves in the army. Artak and his little son are involved in agriculture. They keep cows, sheep, chickens and turkeys. Near the village where they live, Artak also grows apricot trees. To tackle his financial hardships, Artak also goes abroad for seasonal work. He works day and night to be able to sustain his family's living. Now, to sustain his farm, Artak has applied for this loan. The loan will help him to purchase two cows and forage for feeding the livestock. As this is Artak's first loan, it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who didn’t have access to credit products before because they have no credit history.

loans.use: to pay for two cows and forage for feeding the livestock

loans.name: Georgina

texts.es: La señora Georgina es una mujer ejemplar porque siendo humilde con pocos recursos supo sacar adelante a su familia y más aún después de un matrimonio fallido ella sola educo y sustento su hogar, desde muy joven aprendió la confección de prendas de vestir es de esta forma que se gana la vida, empezó con una máquina de coser a medio uso misma que hasta ahora la conserva porque es la que le ayudo en su trabajo para así hacerse conocer con todos los vecinos de la zona que siempre la buscan, también confecciona ropa escolar para los colegios que están en su zona. Actualmente solicita un crédito para comprar una maquina y material para confección (tela e hilos) para poder mejorar sus ingresos y a su vez tener conforme a la clientela ya obtenida.
texts.en: Georgina is an exemplary woman because being humble and with few resources she knew how to get her family ahead, even more after a failed marriage she continued to support and run her home, from a very young age she learned to make clothing items, this is how she earns a living, she started with an used sewing machine, which she still owns because it helped her be known through her work among the neighbors of the area who always look for her, she also makes school clothing for schools in the area.  She currently requests a loan to buy a sewing machine and materials to make clothing (fabric and threads) this way she will improve her income and at the same time have satisfied customers.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and materials (fabric and threads)

loans.name: Wilson Arley

texts.es:
Wilson es un hombre trabajador de 39 años de edad, reconocido por ser servicial y amable. Durante 20 años ha trabajado en el sector transporte, inicialmente como empleado, conduciendo camiones de carga, donde conoció la labor y obtuvo experiencia en el manejo de la actividad; esto lo impulsó a tomar la decisión de independizarse y fue así, como adquirió su propio camión, hace 8 años, en el que presta el servicio de transporte de mercancías, productos agropecuarios, animales, hace acarreos, lleva materiales de construcción y todo tipo de mercancía según el requerimiento de sus clientes; se ubica en un acopio en el que llega el cliente y lo contrata, además tiene la ventaja de poseer clientes fijos que le solicitan el servicio con una simple llamada al celular; así es como Wilson se gana la vida, aun cuando tiene que enfrentarse a un sector en el que se presenta mucha competencia desleal.
El crédito que solicita es para realizar el mantenimiento del camión y hacer la reparación del motor; lo que le permitirá mejorar las condiciones de trabajo y continuar con la prestación de sus servicios, para seguir generando recursos para el sustento diario.
Wilson, como todo ser humano tiene sueños y aspiraciones en la vida; el principal es acreditar y fortalecer más su negocio y, en un futuro a mediano plazo desea estar en la capacidad de incrementar su parque automotor, con más camiones para tener mejor rentabilidad y poder disfrutar mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Wilson, age 39, is a hardworking man who is known for being helpful and friendly. During the 20 years he has worked in the transportation sector, Wilson started out as an employee who drove cargo trucks. He became known for his work and gained driving experience in this position. This eventually led to his decision to become independent and acquire his own truck eight years ago. Wilson provides transport services for all types of goods, including agricultural products and animals. He also hauls construction materials and all other types of merchandise according to the requirements of his customers. His business is located at a depot where his customers can come and contact him. In addition, he has the advantage of established customers who request his services simply by calling him on his mobile phone. Even though Wilson works in a sector in which there is a great deal of unfair competition, this is how he earns his living.

The loan he is requesting will be used to maintain his truck and make repairs to the engine. This will provide better working conditions so that he can continue offering his services. As a result, he can continue generating income for his daily needs.

Wilson is like anyone else who has dreams and aspirations in life. His main goal is to establish and strengthen his business. Sometime in the future, he wants to have the ability to increase his fleet of vehicles by adding more trucks. This will result in greater profitability and better living conditions that he can enjoy.

loans.use: to pay for vehicle maintenance and engine repairs on his truck.

loans.name: Ronal Elvis

texts.es: El señor Ronal de 29 años de edad, soltero, vive en la casa de sus padres y hermanos con quienes comparte algunos gastos, tiene un hijo que depende de sus ingresos, y se queda al cuidado de su abuelita ya que su madre lo abandono. Se dedica a prestar servicios de construcción, trabaja como maestro albañil desde hace 5 años, de lunes a sábado y los fines de semana ayuda a  su hermana quien tiene su ferretería, de esta manera genera sus ingresos, trabajando con responsabilidad y con muchas ganas de superarse, ahora solicita un crédito para la compra de muebles ya que los que tiene se encuentran muy viejos y deteriorados, de esta forma podrá ofrecerle a su hijo mayor bienestar y mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Ronal is 29 years old and single, and lives in a house with his parents and siblings, with whom he shares some expenses.  He has a son who is dependent on his income and is cared for by his grandmother since he was abandoned by his mother.  He works in construction from Monday through Friday, and has been a bricklayer for 5 years.  On the weekends he helps his sister in her hardware store.  This is how he earns his income, working responsibly and with a great desire to get ahead.  He is requesting a loan to buy furniture, because the furniture that he has is old and in poor shape.  With this he will be able to provide his son with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy furniture for his home to improve his living conditions

loans.name: Dennys Fabricio

texts.es:
Dennys  joven de 21 años de edad es soltero vive en casa de la abuela junto con su madre y hermano, en casa propia, en la Ciudad de Latacunga, perteneciente a la República del Ecuador; por referencia de un familiar está solicitando un crédito el mismo que lo utilizara para invertir en más productos naturales que sirven para mejorar la salud de las personas que lo adqieren, estos productos los vende en las tardes y fines de semana.
Es soltero actualmente está estudiando la universidad en  Latacunga se encuentra cursando el segundo semestre de Ingeniería Petroquímica, es muy buen estudiante y emprendedor con su trabajo ayuda a su madre en los gastos de la familia.  Su pequeño negocio ha ido creciendo cada vez más, se dedica a la venta de productos naturales,  A pesar de tener un trabajo que le demanda mucho tiempo y esfuerzo, Dennys es muy responsable en sus estudios y colaborador en su hogar.
Dennys agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por ayudarle con su sueño de continuar creciendo con su negocio.
texts.en:
Dennys is 21, single and lives at his grandmother's house with his mom and brother, in the city of Latacunga, which belongs to the republic of Ecuador; by referral from a family member, he is requesting a loan that he will invest in natural products that help improve health to people that buy them, he sells these products in the afternoons and weekends.
He is single and currently studying at the university of Latacunga, in the second semester of Petro-chemistry Engineering, he is a very good student and entrepreneurial in his work, he helps his mother with the family expenses.  His small business has been growing more and more, selling natural products.  In spite of having work that demands time and effort, Dennys is very responsible in his studies and helpful at home.
Dennys is thankful to Fundacion Alternativa and Kiva for helping him with his dream of continuing growing his business.

loans.use: to buy products for sale to his customers, this way he will have more income.

loans.name: Yuli Carolina

texts.es:
Esta es la historia de una joven llamada yuli, con muchos sueños y aspiraciones que desea triunfar en la vida junto a la familia que esta conformada por los padres, los hermanos mayores y la hija de ella, ellos siempre la han apoyado en las decisiones y han sido unos grandes consejeros; uno de los mayores sueños es estudiar atención integral a la primera infancia, pues con esto desea darle un futuro mejor a la hija y ayudar a la familia.
La pasión de ella es trabajar con niños y niñas que se encuentren en la etapa de educación  inicial, por que desea promover en ellos la creatividad que hay en el interior  y las capacidades que tienen para ser unos verdaderos artistas en la edad en que se encuentran y así  sembrar en ellos el conocimiento de las artes para que en el futuro se refleje con una habilidad del niño o niña. 
Entre las expectativas profesionales, esta el trabajar en los mejores jardines infantiles de Bogotá para llevar los conocimientos a sitios vulnerados y con esto ayudar a niños y niñas de escasos recursos a tener oportunidades de aprender sin ningún costo como lo plantea la ley.
Actualmente cursa la carrera en el instituto campo alto, y para culminar los estudios técnicos ella necesita un apoyo como el que le puede brindar KIVA ya que en el momento no cuenta con los recursos necesarios para terminar la carrera.
texts.en:
This is the story of a young person called Yuli, who has many dreams and aspirations.  

She wants to succeed in life, together with her family, which is composed of her parents, her older siblings, and her daughter.  They have always supported her in her decisions and they have been great advisors.

One of her biggest dreams is to study Comprehensive Early Childhood Care—with it, she hopes to give her daughter a better future, and help her family.

Her passion is working with children in the early stages of education—she wants to foster their creativity and their ability to become true artists at a young age, and she wants to instill a knowledge of the arts that will be reflected in the future abilities of each little boy or girl.

One of her professional expectations is to work in the best nurseries in Bogotá, so that she will be able to bring her knowledge to vulnerable areas, and help give the opportunity to learn at no cost to children who have limited resources, as the law prescribes.

She is studying at the CampoAlto Institute, and she needs the support that a loan from Kiva would provide, in order to complete her technical courses, as she does not have the resources that are necessary to complete the program at this time.

loans.use: to pay for a semester's tuition.

loans.name: Martha Antonia

texts.es:
Martha de 38 años de edad, solo estudió hasta sexto grado debido a la pobreza en  que vivía con sus padres. Está acompañada, su pareja trabaja en albañilería con el que ha procreado 4 hijos, 2 de ellos ya se acompañaron y los otros 2 están estudiando y nadie mas vive con ella.  

 Martha se dedica a vender frutas y verduras ambulante desde hace 20 años, ella nos contó que fue la necesidad que la llevó a aprender el negocio pues lo hizo con el fin de ayudar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar , de esa forma ha podido sacar adelante a sus hijos, su día comienza a las 4:30  AM donde se levanta para preparar el desayuno a su esposo y luego despachar a sus hijos para la escuela, después prepara las frutas para salir a vender a los buses y regresa a casa a las 2 de la tarde para cuidar de su familia.

El préstamo será utilizado, para mejorar la vivienda comprará 600 bloques, 40 bolsas de cemento, 10 polines, 30 metros, 3 quintales de hierro.

Sus sueños es que sus últimos 2 hijos se preparen en una carrera universitaria, para que puedan lograr lo que ella no pudo, además sueña con comprar un solar y construirles una casa a sus hijos, con las ganancias espera ir pagando el crédito para tener las puertas abiertas con la Fundación.
texts.en:
Martha is 38 years old, she only went to sixth grade due to the poverty she lived in with her parents.  She has a partner, who works in construction and with whom she has procreated four children, two have their own family and the other two are studying and no one else lives with her. 

Martha sells fruits and vegetables informally, she has done this for more than 20 years, she told us that it was necessity that got her started in this business, as she was looking to help her husband with the home expenses, this way she has been able to get her children ahead, her day starts at 4:30 AM, she gets up, makes breakfast for her husband and sends her children to school, she then prepares the fruit to go out and sell on the bus and returns home at 2 in the afternoon to take care of her family.

The loan will be used to make improvements. to her house, she will buy 600 bricks, 40 sacks of cement, 10 pieces of lumber, 300 pounds of iron.

Her dreams are that her youngest two children finish an university career, they can do what she couldn't she also dreams to buy a lot and build a house for her children, with the earning she hopes to pay the loan to have the doors open at the Foundation.

loans.use: to make improvements to her house, she will buy 600 bricks, 40 sacks of cement, 10 pieces of lumber, 300 pounds of iron.

loans.name: Nestor Marcelo

texts.es:
Néstor es un señor de 23 años quien vive junto a su esposa y su hijo en el pueblito de Libertad - Sto. Domingo, un sector turístico y productivo, conocido por sus fritadas y balnearios. Viven el sector muchos años en casa de sus padres, quienes les han dado el apoyo para que salgan adelante.
Néstor con la ayuda de su esposa se dedican a criar y a vender chanchos, se dedican a esta actividad hace dos años, les va muy bien ya que en el sector los turistas llegan a degustar de la fritada. 
Néstor acudió a Fundación Alternativa ya que ha tenido buenas referencias de la institución. Se le pudo ayudar con un pequeño crédito que necesita para la compra de chanchos que le están vendiendo de oportunidad, fue beneficiado y se siente muy feliz con la institución y el proyecto kiva ya que le han dado la oportunidad de obtener su primer crédito. Con este dinero podrá mejorar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Nestor is 23 years old and lives with his wife and son in the town of Libertad – Santo Domingo, a tourist area and a productive one, known for its pork fritada and spas.  The have lived in the area for many years with their parents, who have supported them so that they can get ahead.

Nestor and his wife raise and sell pigs.  They have been doing this for two years and things are going very well for them because there are many tourists who enjoy pork fritada.

Nestor approached Fundación Alternativa because has good references form the institution.  He got help through a loan that allowed him to buy pigs and he is very happy with the institution and Kiva, who gave him the chance to get his first loan.  He will be able to improve his sales with this money.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Yajaira Elizabeth

texts.es: Yajaira de 32 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y tres hijos de 15 años, 12 años y 4 años de edad. Yajaira es muy trabajadora y responsable ya que hace todo lo que este a su alcance para dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida. Con mucho esfuerzo junto a su esposo han comprado un Pickup para prestar servicios de transporte en su localidad. Actualmente el carro necesita algunas mejoras para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de llantas, aceite y afinar el carro ya que es su principal herramienta de trabajo. Espera poder contar con el financiamiento y así asegurar el carro para hacer los viajes.
texts.en:
Yajaira is 32 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and three children (ages 15, 12, and 4). She is hardworking and responsible, but above all else, she does everything within her power to provide better living conditions for her children. With great effort, she and her husband bought a pickup truck for providing transport services in their town.

At the moment the vehicle is in need of a few repairs, so she is requesting this loan from FUSAI so that she can invest in the purchase of tires and oil, as well as pay for a tune-up since it is her primary piece of work equipment. Yajaira hopes to receive this loan so that her vehicle can continue to make trips.

loans.use: to buy tires and oil, as well as pay for a tune-up for her truck.

loans.name: Ana Marlene

texts.es: Es una joven de 29 años con iniciativa, originaria de Puerto Cabezas, madre soltera de tres hijos en edad escolar. Desde hace aproximadamente 9 años estableció su propio negocio de venta de cosméticos ya accesorios de belleza, con las ganancias percibidas, le ha permitido establecer su tienda de ropa nueva en el mercado municipal. Solicita financiamiento para comprar: zapatos para damas y niños, sandalias, botas, short, camisetas para mujeres, hombres y niños, vestidos. La mercadería la compra en Managua para venderla a precios accesibles. Gracias a los dos financiamientos anteriores que recibió de PANA PANA y con las ganancias de su negocio, le ha permitido construir su muro de concreto, para vivir de manera de segura, debido a que anteriormente era de maya. Su sueño es que su negocio continúe creciendo y apoyar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
This young woman is 29 years of age and has initiative. She is originally from Puerto Cabezas and is a single mother of three school-age children. Approximately nine years ago, she established her own business of selling cosmetics and beauty accessories. The profits she earned enabled her to open a new clothing store at the municipal market.

The borrower is requesting a loan in order to buy shoes for women and children, sandals, boots, shorts, T-shirts for all ages, and dresses. Her merchandise is purchased in Managua and then sold at affordable prices. Thanks to the two previous loans she received from Pana Pana and the profits from her business, she has been able to build a concrete security wall so that she can live safely since it was previously made of another material.

Her dream is to continue growing her business and to support her children.

loans.use: to buy women's and children's shoes, sandals, boots, shorts, T-shirts, and dresses.

loans.name: José Pedro

texts.es:
José de 60 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado debido a la pobreza tuvo que abandonar la escuela. Está casado y su pareja se dedica en los quehaceres del hogar, tienen 2 hijos de 32 y 24 años de edad, uno ya está casado y el otro vive con ellos;  pero ya no estudia sino que se dedica a la agricultura y nadie mas depende de ellos.  

 José se dedica a trabajar de molinero desde hace 15 años, aprendió por la necesidad de sostener su familia, antes de ser molinero trabajaba en la agricultura y eso lo aprendió de su papá, también se dedica desde hace 40 años a sastre, la cual elabora pantalones después de su jornada en el molino, su día comienza a las 4:30 AM para irse a su trabajo de molinero donde camina aproximadamente unos 20 minutos, donde los clientes comienza a llegar a las 5 de la mañana y termina su jornada a las 4 PM y luego se conduce a su casa.         

El préstamo será utilizado, en la compra de 4 novillos, de los cuales espera vender y comprar su propio molino

Su sueño es tener su propio molino, pues ya se siente cansado para caminar y llegar donde trabaja, por eso sueña con tener en casa el trabajo, también desea construir su casa de ladrillo; porque la que él tiene es de bahareque y quiere comprar otras 2 novillas.
texts.en: Jose is 60 years old.  He went to school as far as the sixth grade, and then had to leave school due to poverty.  He is married, and his wife works in the home.  They have two sons who are 32 and 34.  One of them is married, and the other lives with them, but is no longer a student and works in agriculture, so they have no dependants. Jose has worked as a miller for 15 years.  He learned this trade in order to support his family.  Before becoming a miller he worked in agriculture, which he learned from his father.  He has also worked for 40 years as a tailor, making pants after his day working at the mill.  His day starts at 4:30 in order to go to work at the mill, which takes about 20 minutes, and where customers start to arrive about 5 am.  His day ends at 4 pm, when he returns to his home.  The loan will be used to buy 4 steers, which he hopes  to sell in order to buy his own mill.  His dream is to have his own mill, because he is tired of walking to work, and dreams of working at home.  He would also like to build a brick house, because the one that he owns is made of mud, and to buy 2 more steers.

loans.use: to buy 4 steers.

loans.name: José Pastor

texts.es:
José de 43 años de edad, solamente estudió hasta noveno grado, debido a la situación económica en que vivían sus padres y también por el conflicto armado que se puso difícil en el cantón donde él vivía. Está acompañado, tiene 2 hijos de 16 y 14 años de edad, su pareja trabaja en la agricultura con él, sus hijos están estudiando y nadie mas depende de ellos.   

José  se dedica a la agricultura desde muy pequeño, pues fue su padre quien le enseñó el trabajo, además de la agricultura se dedica a la ganadería y siempre le ha gustado tener vacas, su día comienza a las 4.30 AM, mientras espera el desayuno afila su cuma y su machete para luego dirigirse a su trabajo, donde camina 40 minutos para llegar donde trabaja, labora 6 horas y regresa a su casa por la tarde, se dedica a cuidar su ganado.            


El préstamo sera utilizado, para comprar 3 toretes, pues ya sacó la cosecha y le quedará el rastrojo y quiere aprovecharlo. 


Su sueño es dejarle a sus hijos una casa, sueña con verlos graduarse en la universidad, ya que el no tuvo la  oportunidad de hacerlo y no quiere que a ellos les pase lo mismo, por eso se está esforzando para ahorrar y la mejor manera de ahorrar es comprando animales y de la venta poder pagar el crédito.
texts.en:
José is 43, he only studied up to 9th grade due to the economic situation that his parents lived in and also due to the internal conflicts in the zone where he lived.  He is not single, has two children ages 16 and 14, his partner works in agriculture with him, their children study and they don't have other dependents.

Jose has worked in agriculture since he was very little, it was his father who taught him how to work, in addition to agriculture he also has cattle, he has always liked to have cows, his day starts at 4:30 AM, he makes breakfast, sharpens his knives and machete to then go to work, he walks for 40 minutes to get to work, he works for 6 hours and returns home in the afternoon to take care of his cattle.

The loan will be used to buy three heads of cattle, he has completed harvest and has some hay that he wants to take advantage of.

His dream is to leave a house of his kids, he dreams of seeing them finish university, because he didn't have the opportunity to do it, he doesn't want the same thing to happen to them, this is why he is making an effort to save and buy livestock and through their sale be able to pay for the loan.

loans.use: to buy three heads of cattle.

loans.name: Leydis Lorena

texts.es:
Leydis de 35 años de edad,  es viuda su esposo acaba de fallecer, estudio hasta educación media. Es madre de dos hijos entre las edades de uno y cinco años. 

Ella  se dedica a la confección de ropa para dama y caballero, oficio que aprendió de su madre y que tiene años de realizar, para comenzar su dia se levanta a las 5:00 a.m.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para mejorar su vivienda, ya que actualmente el techo no sirve y representa un peligro para su familia

ella desea en un futuro, poder darles una buena educación a sus hijos y se conviertan en profesionales.
texts.en:
Leydis is 35 years old, she is a widow, her husband just passed away, she studied up to junior high school.  She is the mother of two children ages five and one.

She works making clothing for women and men, she learned this activity from her mother and has done it for years, to start her day she gets up at 5:00 AM

The loan requested is to make improvements to her house, currently the roof doesn't work and represents a danger for her family.

She wishes in the future to be able to provide for a good education for her children so that they become professionals.

loans.use: to make improvements to her house, currently the roof doesn't work and represents a danger for her family.

loans.name: William

texts.es:
El es William, graduado de bachiller del año 2010, es un joven emprendedor y activo, ha cursado 5 semestres de ingeniería industrial,  es muy  aplicado en la universidad con buenas notas, en el aspecto laboral se destaca por el buen manejo y actitud frente a las personas que lo rodean, pensando en cada día crecer personalmente atreves del  trabajo y estudio enriqueciendo los conocimientos,  la familia esta conformada por los 5 hermanos, son muy unidos ya que se apoyan en todas las circunstancias. 
El principal motivo  por el cual  William necesita el  convenio es no solo por la facilidad económica y el apoyo que esto trae, si no exactamente por qué hace varios años se ha interesado por este campo de la cocina para el cual a escogido a la institución de campo alto para llevar a cavo el sueño que tiene. 
Así  aprendiendo a nivel general sobre este tema para así poder desarrollarlo y concluirlo de una forma satisfactoria. 

MUCHAS GRACIAS
texts.en:
This is William.  He graduated from high school in 2010.  William is an enterprising and active guy.  He has completed five semesters of college, studying industrial engineering.  He works hard at school and gets good grades.  At work, he stands out for good management and a good attitude toward the people around him, thinking about personal growth through work and school every day and enriching his understanding.  His family is composed of five brothers and they are very close, supporting each other in every situation.  The main reason William needs the loan is not just to make his financial situation easier and the support that would give him, but actually because for several years he has been interested in the field of cooking.  This is why he chose CampoAlto as the place to pursue his dream, learning the basics of this topic to be able to develop it and conclude satisfactorily.  

Thank you very much.

loans.use: to pay tuition for a semester

loans.name: Ulkhanoy

texts.ru:
Ульханой 39 лет. Она мать двоих детей и любимая супруга. Муж Ульханой находиться на заработках в Российской Федерации. Она с детьми живет на районе Хуросон. Там же она работает в сфере торговли детской одежды, нижнего белья и носовых платков. Она начала работать пару лет назад, чтобы покрыть семейные расходы и обучение детей. У нее сын в возрасте 17 и дочь в возрасте 19 лет. Они помогают и поддерживают маму во всем. 
   Гульханой решила купить больше различных товаров, чтобы расширить ассортимент продаваемого товара и свою доходность. Но для реализации купли у нее не хватает средств, поэтому она просит вас помочь. Помогите ей.
texts.en:
Ulkhanoy is 39 years old. She is a beloved wife and the mother of two children.  Her husband is currently working in Russia.  Ulkhanoy and her children live in the Khuroson district of Tajikistan.  She works in retail and sells children's clothes, underwear and handkerchiefs.  She started working a couple of years ago to cover the family's expenses and to pay for her children's education.  She has a 17-year-old son and a 19-year-old daughter.  Both her children help and fully support her. 

Ulkhanoy wants to buy various merchandise in order to increase her inventory and her income.  However, she doesn't have enough money to make this purchase and she is asking for your support.  Please help her.

loans.use: to increase her inventory and to buy children's clothes.

loans.name: Tito

texts.es:
Tito, vive en una casa familiar,  por iniciativa propia y debido a  la necesidad de generar ingresos para apoyar en los gastos familiar hace 20 años emprendió el negocio de venta de ropa nueva, lo cual realiza en un horario de 6:00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m., por el momento no se le ha presentado ninguna dificultad.
Invertirá en la compra de variedad de ropa, como faldas, pantalones, blusas, camisas y trajes para niños y niñas, con lo que surtirá el negocio para las fechas de fin de año, espera mejorar su clientela, aumentar sus ventas, tener más ingresos y cancelar sus deudas.
Sueña con trabajar con su propio capital y comprar su casa propia.
texts.en: Tito lives in his family home.  Twenty years ago, on his own initiative, and in order to earn income to support his family, he learned how to sell clothing.  He works from 6:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m., and until now has had no difficulties.  He will use the loan to buy clothing such as skirts, pants, blouses, shirts and suits for boys and girls, with which to supply his business for New Year's parties.  He hopes to improve his customer base and increase his sales, in order to earn more income and pay his debts. He dreams of working with his own capital and owning his own home.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothing.

loans.name: Fidel Alexander

texts.es:
Fidel, es casado, vive con su esposa, por iniciativa propia desde hace 10 años instalo una tienda en su vivienda, la atiende de 6:00 a.m. hasta las 9:00 p.m., es de realizar esta actividad económica que genera los ingresos para cubrir los gastos de su hogar.
Comprará bebidas, cereales, jabón, detergentes, golosinas, pan, etc., con lo que podrá variar los productos que ofrece a sus clientes, espera aumentar sus ventas, mejorar sus ingresos, atraer clientes nuevos y cancelar sus deudas.
Aspira ampliar su negocio, trabajar con capital propio y mejorar las condiciones familiares.
texts.en: Fidel is married and lives with his wife.  Ten years ago, on his own initiative, he opened a store in his house.  He works from 6:00 a.m. until 9:00 p.m., and with the income that he earns he supports his household.  He will buy drinks, cereal, soap, detergent, snacks, bread, etc., with which to offer a variety of products to his customers.  He hopes to increase his sales, improve his income, attract new customers and pay his debts.  He aspires to build his business, work with his own capital and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy drinks, cereal, soap, detergent, snacks, bread, etc.

loans.name: Kelly Jhoanna

texts.es: Mi Nombre es kelly jhoanna, estudia auxiliar de enfermería ,estudia esta carrera por que es la vocación que desde pequeña la ha inspirado,  ya que esta dedicada al cuidado de la salud de las personas, estudiando esta carrera ha aprendido muchas cosas que le han servido en la vida cotidiana y a las personas que la rodean, el convenio le es de mucha ayuda ya que no tiene un trabajo donde tenga ingresos económicos estables, los padres gracias a Dios le pueden dar estudio pero aveces la situación no es la mejor para pagar las cuotas, por eso seria bueno el subsidio con kiva, ya que a los papas le quedarían mas fácil pagar las cuotas.
texts.en:
“My name is Kelly Jhoanna, and I am studying to be a nursing assistant.” 

She is pursuing this career because the vocation of caring for people’s health has inspired her ever since she was a little girl. Through studying for this career, she has learned many things that have helped her in her daily life, and also the people around her. 

The agreement is a great help, as she does not have a job that provides a steady income.  Her parents, thanks to God, can give her an education; but sometimes the situation for making payments is not the best.

The loan from Kiva would be good, as it will become much easier for her parents to make the payments.

loans.use: to pay for a semester's tuition.

loans.name: Nelson Antonio

texts.es:
Nelson de 30 años de edad, es una persona acompañada que estudio hasta noveno grado, padre de un hijo de tres años. Se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. Junto a su esposa.

Nelson  se dedica a la agricultura oficio que aprendió de sus padres,  para llegar a la parcelas camina 4 Km y trabaja durante la mañana y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a cuidar las vacas que poseen.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar una vaca que necesita, para poder incrementar la producción de leche y así obtener un ingreso que le ayudara a mantener a su familia. 

 Nelson planea  en un futuro, poder construir una vivienda digna, para su familia ya que actualmente vive en una de adobe.
texts.en: Nelson is 30 years old, and went to school as far as the ninth grade.  He lives in a common-law relationship and has a three-year-old child.  He wakes up at 5:00 a.m., along with his wife.  Nelson works in agriculture, which he learned from his parents.  He walks 4 km to get to his fields, and works during the morning while his wife does the household chores and looks after the cows that they own.  The loan that he is requesting is to buy a cow, which they need in order to increase their milk production and to have income that will help to support the family.  Nelson is planning in future to build a good house for his family, because they now live in an adobe house.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es:
Reyna de 54 años de edad,  debido a la situación económica de sus padres, solo logro cursar hasta un quinto grado ya tenia que ayudar a su madre en los quehaceres del hogar y a su padre en la agricultura; ya que era la fuente de ingreso de su familia, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura y a la crianza de ganado de respasto, sus 5 hijos todos mayores de edad, ya están acompañados y han construido sus casas en los terrenos de su propiedad, quienes trabajan en conjunto con su esposo quien trabaja la agricultura.


ella se dedica a la crianza de animales de granja pollos, cerdos y bovinos ademas le ayuda a su esposo a trabajar en la agricultura, su madre quien le enseño a trabajar y a cuidar lo que tenían para su familia, también le ayudaba a su padre en la agricultura; luego cuando se caso, no se le hacia difícil el trabajo ya que su esposo se dedica a la agricultura.


Los fondos del créditos serán utilizados, en la compra de 4 bovinos para repasto. Ella espera seguir trabajando y apoyando  a su esposo en lo que se pueda cuidando los animales que compre.
texts.en: Reyna is 54 years old.  Due to her parents' financial circumstances she was only able to go to school as far as the fifth grade, after which she had to help her mother with the household chores and her father with agriculture, which was the family's source of income.  Her husband works in agriculture and raising cattle.  Her 5 children are all adults, have spouses and have built their own houses on their property, and work with her husband in agriculture.  She works raising animals such as chickens, pigs and cattle, and also helping her husband.  Her mother taught her to work and to raise what she needs for her family, and she also helped her mother with agriculture.  Later, when she married, she did not find the work difficult because her husband worked in agriculture.  The loan proceeds will be used to buy 4 cattle.  She hopes to continue working and supporting her husband as much as she can, by raising animals that she buys.

loans.use: to buy 4 cattle.

loans.name: Shakeela's Group

texts.en:
Shakeela is 38 years old. She is a responsible mother living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. This is her sixth loan with BRAC Pakistan. She has been taking loans as needed for her family. Shakeela belongs to a poor family, and it is very difficult for her to pay for all the household expenses with a low income. 

Her husband is a hawker and sells many hair oils by bicycle. He sells mustard oil, avocado oil, castor oil, coconut oil, olive oil, rosemary oil, and safflower oil. He loudly calls in the streets to customers to offer all the hair oils for sale. He is famous for his hair oil that protects hair from falling out. 

Shakeela's husband wants to buy a large quantity of hair oil to sell in order to grow his business and to overcome poverty. Shakeela requested a loan for her husband so he can buy more hair oil. 

She is very impressed with this generous support. She thanks Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

Note: Shakeela is raising her hand in the given picture.

loans.use: to buy hair oils to sell.

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en:
Naseem is a 57 year old married woman living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. 

She is requesting a loan for her son’s food business. He makes and sells ladoo. (Ladoo, or laddu, is a ball-shaped food popular in Pakistan as well as in regions with immigrants from Pakistan. Ladoo is made of gram flour, spices, and salt with other ingredients that vary by recipe). He uses a four-wheeled pushcart for selling ladoo and as a hawker he can easily reach the nearest people. Due to his recipe's good taste, he has attained a regular list of customers and makes enough to contribute to the family income.

He wants to sell his ladoo from a small stall instead of his four-wheeled cart, but he does not have enough cash to buy a wooden stall and more ingredients for making ladoo.

Naseem requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, so her son can buy a wooden stall, gram flour, cauliflower, onions, and ketchup. She is proud of her son and appreciates his efforts for his family. Naseem wants to save the profits so that she can use the savings for future sudden needs.

loans.use: to buy a stall, gram flour, ketchup, and coal for selling ladoo.

loans.name: Karen Vanessa

texts.es: Es originaria de Puerto Cabezas, casada, tiene 28 años de edad y tiene 3 hijos en edad escolar. Desde hace 10 años estableció en su vivienda la venta de carbón y de bastimento. Solicita financiamiento para comprar 100 sacos de carbón y productos de bastimentos (filipitas, malanga, plátanos, quequisque y yuca. Su sueño es establecer una abarrotería en punto estratégico que le permita tener mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
This borrower is originally from Puerto Cabezas. She is 28 years old, married, and has three school-age children. Ten years ago, she established a business in her home where she sells charcoal and provisions.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy 100 sacks of charcoal and provisions such as "filipitas" (a variety of banana), malanga root, bananas, "quequisque" (a tuber similar to taro), and cassava. Her dream is to establish a grocery store in a strategic location so that she can earn more income.

loans.use: to buy 100 sacks of charcoal and a variety of produce to sell.

loans.name: María Eugenia

texts.es:
María de 28 años de edad,  sus padres de muy escasos recursos solo le dieron que pudiese cursar hasta un 6º grado; ya que era una numerosa familia que tenían que trabajar en la agricultura y ayudandole a su madre. Su pareja se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura y sus hijos pequeños de 4 y 6 años, uno de ellos esta estudiando en la escuela de la comunidad cursando un primer grado.

Ella se dedica a cuidar animales de granja, cerdos y pollos, ademas trabaja con una señora a la que le ayuda a los oficios del hogar y también esta señora tiene un negocio de destazo de res y venta de tortillas; este trabajo lo hace todos los días. También vende de casa en casa la carne, esta rutina la hace dos veces por semana y los otros días le ayuda en otras actividades, madruga todos los días ya que su casa se encuentra a 3 kilómetros del lugar de su trabajo, antes de esto le deja preparada la comida a sus hijos y su compañero de vida para todo el día ya que regresa a las 6 de la tarde a su hogar.


Los fondos del crédito serán destinados, en la compra de cerdos y el concentrado para los mismos. Espera darles el estudio a sus hijos hasta donde sea posible, con el préstamo tendrá en futuro un nuevo ingreso que le ayudara a su familia y con las ganancias espera comprar otros animales de granja y para los gastos de la familia.
texts.en: Maria is 28 years old.  Her parents were poor, and therefore were only able to support her as far as the 6th grade.  Because her family was large, she had to go to work in agriculture and to help her mother.  Her spouse works in agriculture and their children are 4 and 6 years old.  One of them goes to school in the community and is in the first grade.  She works raising animals such as pigs and chickens.  She also works for a woman, providing household help and working in the woman's  business butchering beef and selling tortillas.  She does this work every day.  She also sells meat door to door, twice a week, and helps her with other activities on other days.  She wakes up early every day, because her house is located 3 kilometers from her work place.  Before leaving she makes food for her husband and children for the whole day, because she returns home at 6 in the evening.  The loan will be used to buy pigs and pig feed.  She hopes to be able to pay for her children to go to school for as long as possible.  With the loan she will have a new income in future, which will help her family, and with her earnings she hopes to buy more animals and to pay the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy pigs and pig feed.

loans.name: Abdul Abbas

texts.en: Abdul Abbas is a grocer. He is an Iraqi client, aged 54 years old, who is married and has three children. In his grocery store, Abdul Abbas offers various types of products for his customers such as canned food, detergents, dairy products and snacks. He established his business in 2013 and has gained good experience in this field. Abdul Abbas has gained a good reputation in his neighborhood thanks to the competitive selling prices that he offers. He is requesting a sum of $3,000 as a loan to renovate his grocery store. Abdul Abbas is an ambitious person. He hopes that this renovation will attract more customers and will result in the increase of his profits.

loans.use: to renovate his grocery store

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
Jorge es un joven pescador de 23 años de edad, que convive con su compañera sentimental en unión libre y es padre de un bebé de 10 meses de nacido. Toda su vida ha vivido cerca a la rivera del río Magdalena, en el que aprendió de sus padres y familiares todo lo relacionado con la pesca de río, pues ha sido la principal fuente de ingresos que ha pasado de generación en generación; tiene su propia canoa a motor y; la pesca diaria es vendida en el mercado del municipio donde reside, generando así los ingresos para el sustento familiar.
Solicita el apoyo del crédito para fortalecer su labor, pues requiere comprar un chinchorro para pesca de bagres, un velador y un trasmallo, herramientas que le permitirán pescar mayor cantidad de animales y así mejorar las ventas y los ingresos que de ellas recibe; abriendo paso para seguir avanzando y poder llegar a cumplir su meta principal que es crear una pesquera que distribuya a nivel regional, generando mayor rentabilidad para dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar.
texts.en:
Jorge is a young fisherman who is 23 years of age. He and his girlfriend are in a common-law relationship and he is the father of a 10-month-old baby. Jorge has lived his entire live near the Magdalena River, where he learned everything about fishing from his parents and relatives. Fishing is the primary source of income that has been passed on from generation to generation. Jorge has his own motorized canoe. The fish he catches each day is sold at the market in the town where he lives. This is how he generates income to support his family.

Jorge is requesting the assistance of a loan so that he can strengthen his business. He needs to buy a net for holding catfish, a lantern, and a fish trap. These are the pieces of equipment that will allow him to catch a greater quantity of fish so that he can increase his sales and his income.
