She is asking for a loan to buy additional stock to sell like noodles, cooking oil, soy sauce, spices, canned goods, and chips.

Gina believes in the value of hard work and perseverance. She dreams of sending her children to school.

loans.use: to buy noodles, cooking oil, soy sauce, spices, canned goods, and chips

loans.name: Marcos

texts.en:
Marcos is a farmer from San Miguel, Bohol, Philippines. He is a married man and has three children. 

He has been in the farming business for more than seven years. This is the source of his income.

Marcos is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer for the farm. With this loan, he will be able to improve the productivity of his farm and increase his yield and profit.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for the farm

loans.name: Safarbek

texts.ru:
Сафарбек живет на районе Гиссар. Ему 22 года. Он живет в родительском доме с родителями и братом. Сафарбек уже несколько лет занимается растениеводством. Он выращивает кукурузу и пшеницу на земельном участке. Сейчас Сафарбек решил заняться садоводством. Он планирует выращивать виноград. Чтобы вырастить виноградный сад, понадобиться немало средств и сил. Сафарбек не из тех, кто боится трудностей, поэтому поставил себе цель и смело идет к своей мечте. 
  На данный момент он берет кредит, чтобы улучшить зимний урожай и другую часть для сада. Чтобы приобрести необходимые средства, нужны деньги. Поэтому он просит Вас помочь ему. Он ждет поддержки с Вашей стороны.
texts.en:
Safarbek lives in the Gissar region. He is 22 years old. He lives in his parent's house together with his parents and brother. Safarbek has been working with crop production for a few years already. He grows sweet corn and wheat on a plot of land.

Now Safarbek has decided to work with gardening. He plans to grow grapes. In order to grow a vineyard, he needs a lot of resources and effort. Safarbek is not one of those who fear difficulties, and therefore he set a goal for himself and boldly moves towards his dream. Currently he takes a loan in order to increase the winter harvest and improve another part of the garden. In order to get the necessary funds, he needs money. Therefore he requests help from You. He awaits support from You.

loans.use: to grow a vineyard

loans.name: Norberta

texts.en:
Norberta runs a small business providing transportation using her motorcycle in the community of Panglao in Bohol, Philippines. This has been her source of income for quite sometime now. Most of her customers are her neighbors. 

She wants to maintain her business, so she is asking for a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy gasoline, tires, and motor oil. She hopes to keep her business so she can provide for the needs of her family which includes eight children. 

Norberta dreams of seeing her children become successful in their lives with a proper education.

loans.use: to buy gasoline, tires, and motor oil

loans.name: Xiomara Paola

texts.es:
Xiomara Paola, desde el colegio siempre le ha llamado la atención la biología sobresalía sacando buenas notas en esa materia, el sueño era estudiar medicina, por tiempo y costos no pudo inscribirse, pensó en hacer un curso relacionado con salud y escogió servicios farmacéuticos, le parece muy bonito el saber del cuerpo humano y las medicinas, poder ayudar y brindar una buena atención a personas que padecen alguna enfermedad, ser un gran  apoyo para cumplir las necesidades.
El motivo por el cual quiere el convenio con  kiva es seguir con el sueño de ser tecnóloga en farmacia, tener un futuro mejor en cuanto a oportunidades en la vida y la posibilidad que se abran nuevos caminos, al inscribirse le dieron un valor mas cómodo para poder pagar  por  todo el programa, pero en el momento no tiene empleo y le queda difícil pagar el valor actual.
texts.en:
Since grade school, biology always interested Xiomara Paola, who stood out by getting good grades in the subject.  Her dream was to study medicine, but she could not attend because of time and the cost.  She thought about a course of study related to health and she chose pharmaceuticals.  She thinks it is very nice to know the human body and medicines; to be able to help and offer good assistance to people suffering from illnesses; and to be a great help in taking care of what needs to be done.  

The reason she wants this loan with Kiva is to keep pursuing her dream of becoming a pharmacy technician and having a better future in terms of life opportunities and the possibility of new paths opening up for her.  When she registered they gave her a more comfortable price so she could pay for the entire program, but she currently does not have a job and she is having difficulty paying the current amount.

loans.use: to pay a semester's tuition

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: El es miguel angel, estudia auxiliar de enfermaría, el tuvo el convenio con kiva el semestre pasado y le pareció una ayuda económica muy buen para él, ya que pudo terminar su semestre con mayor facilidad de pago y mucho entusiasmo para continuar con el otro semestre, le pareció muy interesante el proceso de su anterior semestre, ya que aprendió cosas nuevas y que él no sabía,  de nuevo pide la colaboración de kiva para que le puedan facilitar por segunda oportunidad el subsidio, ya que quiere terminar la carrera para poder empezar a laborar en un ambiente similar a lo que estudia.
texts.en:
He is Miguel Angel, a nursing student. He got a Kiva loan last semester and found it to be a good economic help, since it allowed him to finish his semester with an increased ease of making payments and much enthusiasm to continue with the following semester. He found his study in the last semester to be very interesting, since he learned new things that he didn't know before.

Once again he is requesting Kiva's help to pay his tuition, since he wants to finish with his studies and start working in his field.

loans.use: To pay the tuition fees for one semester

loans.name: Samad

texts.ru:
Самад проживает на районе Гиссар. Ему 51 год. Самад женат. У него пятеро детей. Двое сыновей и трое дочек. Сыновья находятся за приделами Родины. Там они живут и работают. Самад занимается земледелием. На земельном участке выращивает пшеницу.
   Сейчас он хочет посадить пшеницу, потому что климат Таджикистана позволяет посадить зимний урожай в середине зимы, потому что зима в Таджикистане приходит не очень холодно. Самад хочет купить семена и минеральные удобрения для посева, но необходимой суммы денег у него не хватает. Он просит вас помочь ему купить семена и удобрения, чтобы посадить зимний урожай.
texts.en:
Samad lives in the Gissar region. He is 51 years old. Samad is married and has five children; two children and three daughters. The sons are located in Russia, where they live and work. 

Samad works with agriculture. On his plot of land he grows wheat. Currently he would like to sow wheat, because the Tajik climate allows planting winter crops in the middle of the winter. The winter in Tajikistan is not very cold. 

Samad would like to purchase seeds and mineral fertilizers for sowing, but he does not have the necessary money. He requests you to help him purchase seeds and fertilizers, in order to plant winter crops.

loans.use: to sow winter wheat

loans.name: Rita

texts.es:
La socia Rita sigue dedicándose a su negocio de  producción y venta de pinturas al oleo, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar pinturas, tela para lienzos, entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida con los inversionistas por ayudarla a desarrollarse en su actividad, ella se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en:
Rita continues making a living from her business producing and selling oil paint. She has been doing this for some time and has done well thanks to the efforts she puts into her business every day. She is a responsible and hard-working person. She wishes to be able to keep working so as to keep supporting her family.

Rita is requesting the loan in order to buy paint and cloth for canvases among other items. She is thankful to Kiva investors because they have helped her to continue with her business, and promises to pay her loan in time.

loans.use: to buy paint and cloth for canvases among other items

loans.name: Maribel

texts.en:
Maribel is a married woman and a mother of four children from Trinidad, Bohol, Philippines. She earns a living through her hog raising business.

She is asking for a loan to buy animal feed. With this loan, she will be able to grow healthy pigs. 

Maribel hopes to make her business a success so that it will generate more income. Her income is necessary for daily expenses and for the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy animal feed

loans.name: María Luisa

texts.es:
María, es una mujer de cuarenta y nueve años, ella es soltera, no estudio ningún grado, vive solamente con dos hijos en total tiene seis hijos, dos de sus hijos están en Estados Unidos, su esposo se fue para los estados unidos y ella y sus hijos perdieron comunicación con él  y es por eso que no reciben  la ayuda económica de parte del esposo.
Es una mujer luchadora se dedica a trabajos de finca riega de abono,                                                                                                     apodar, corta de café y otros, y este trabajo lo hace desde que era una niña, desde entonces lo aprendió y lo aprendió de sus padres, ella  para ir a las fincas donde realiza su trabajo tiene que levantarse a las 3:00 de la madrugada y camina 1 hora.
Ella quiere una mejor condición para sus hijos, por eso quiere repellar la casa necesita comprar cemento, arena y hierro y su casa, su familia estará más segura y podrán tener más espacio.

En el futuro piensa hacer un muro para que su casa este más segura, ya que se encuentra cerca de un paredón, también piensa en comprar una finca, para trabajar en lo propio para que sus 2 hijos que viven con ella estudien ya que sus primero cuatro hijos no lo pudieron hacer.
texts.en:
María is a 49-year-old woman; she is single; and she did not attend school at all.  She only lives with two of her children; she has six children total.  Two of her children are in the United States.  Her husband left for the United States and she and her two children lost contact with him and so they no longer receive financial support from her husband. 

She is a hardworking woman who does farm work, spreading fertilizer, cutting coffee, and other chores, and she has done this work since she was a child.  She learned this work at that time and she learned it from her parents.  In order to get to the farms where she does her work she has to get up at 3:00 in the morning and she walks an hour. 

She wants better conditions for her children, which is why she wants to replaster her house.  She needs to buy cement, sand, and iron, and her house and her family will be safer and able to have more space.  

In the future she plans to build a wall so her house will be safer, as she is close to a rock face.  She is also thinking about buying a farm so she can work on her own land so the two children who live with her can go to school, as her first four children were not able to.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and iron to replaster her house

loans.name: Mirasol

texts.en:
Mirasol, a mother of two, lives in the town of San Miguel, Bohol, Philippines. 

She earns a living through the retail sale of kitchenware. This is her source of income.

Mirasol is asking for a loan to buy more stock to sell like Tupperware, basins, and other kitchen materials. 

With this loan, she will be able to sell more kitchenware and increase her income.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell like tupperwares, basin, and other kitchen materials

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie lives with her family in the town of San Miguel, Bohol, Philippines. She earns a living through her sari-sari (convenience) store. 

She is asking for a loan to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, candies, soda, soap, and beverages. With this loan, she will be able to increase her store's stock and allow her to attract more buyers. 

In the future, Rosemarie hopes of making her business a success.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, candies, soda, soap, and beverages

loans.name: Nemith

texts.es: Nemith tiene 44 años, es madre soltera de 2 hijos, vive en una vivienda propia hecha de material noble que logró construir con mucho esfuerzo. Nemith se tiene una jugueria, a diario y desde muy temprano recibe la visita de sus clientes a quienes tiene el gusto de ofrecer una gran variedad de jugos hechos a base de papaya, fresa, plátanos, entre otros, además de diversas bebidas heladas que tienen buena acogida entre sus clientes por residir en una zona tropical. Una de las ventajas que facilitan el desarrollo su negocio es que las frutas que usa para la preparación de sus bebidas son netas de su localidad y se ve reflejado en los precios accesibles que posee. Le agrada mucho brindar la atención correspondiente en su negocio ya que es una persona muy atenta que ha beneficiado en el incremento de su clientela. Es el primer préstamo que solicita a Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Desea en esta oportunidad contar con 1,000 nuevos soles para la renovación de sillas y mesas de su negocio esperando brindarle a sus clientes un mejor servicio.
texts.en:
Nemith is 44 years old and is the single mother of two children. She lives in her own home made of quality construction materials, which she was able to build with a lot of effort. Nemith has a juice store. Every day, she has customers beginning very early and she has the pleasure of offering them a great variety of juices, like papaya, strawberry, banana, etc. She also serves frozen beverages that her customers really enjoy due to the tropical climate.

One of the advantages that has facilitated the development of her business is that the fruits that she uses for her juices are grown in the area, so this is reflected in the low prices that she offers. She enjoys providing attention to her business since she is a very attentive person, and this has given her more customers.

This is the first loan that she has sought from Kiva and she is grateful for the financial support that she has received to continue to move forward. She also promises to make her payments on time. She hopes to have 1,000 nuevos soles to re-do the tables and chairs in her business because she hopes to provide better service to her customers.

loans.use: to purchase tables and chairs for her business.

loans.name: Maria Virginia

texts.es:
La señora María Virginia sigue dedicándose al negocio de  venta de productos de belleza como cosméticos en general y perfumería, la socia lleva años dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día su negocio, la socia vende a sus clientes que le solicitan como amistades, familiares entre otros,siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de perfumes para damas.
La socia está muy agradecida con los inversionistas  por ayudarla a desarrollarse en su actividad y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en:
María Virginia is still working at her business selling beauty products, such as general cosmetics and fragrances.  She has had her business for years and it is going well for her because of the effort she puts into it every day.  She sells to the customers who order from her, such as her friends, relatives, and others, and in this way she gets her family ahead.  

She is requesting this loan to buy women's perfumes.  

She is very thankful to the lenders for helping her develop her business and she promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy women's perfumes

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
El señor Julio sigue dedicándose al negocio de restaurante, él socio lleva años dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone caída a su negocio, él socio es una persona responsable siendo  de esta forma que le socio saca adelante a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos como aceite,arroz entre otros.
 El señor Julio se siente agradecido con los inversionistas por ayudarlo en su actividad económica.
El señor Julio pertenece al banco comunal “KUKULI” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú.
texts.en:
Julio continues to dedicate himself to his restaurant business. He has worked in this business for years, and it is going well for him thanks to the dedication he puts into his work. He is a responsible person, and this is the way that he is helping his family get ahead. 

The borrower is requesting the loan to buy supplies such as cooking oil and rice, among others. He is grateful to the lenders for helping him with his economic activity. 

Julio belongs to the “Kukuli” communal bank, in the city of Cusco, Peru.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as cooking oil, rice and other items.

loans.name: Sector La Unión Group

texts.es:
Regina es una señora casada de 33 años de edad, vive junto a sus cinco hijos ambos aun están estudiando y viven en el Departamento de Sololá. Ella se encuentra en la parte izquierda de la fotografía.
Ella comenta que se dedica a la elaboración de tejidos artesanales en el lugar de su domicilio. Eligió esta actividad porque es un producto rentable y que atreves de ello obtiene ingresos y ganancias aceptables que le ayudan aportar a la economía de su familia.
Ahora ella se ha dado cuenta que su producto cada vez es más vendible, por lo que ha tomado la decisión de formar un grupo para elaborar más tejidos artesanales con el propósito de mejorar la economía de sus familias y para dar a conocer el volar del arte. De manera que el préstamo lo utilizaran para la compra de artículos artesanales para la elaboración de estos tejidos.
Su mayor sueño es sacar adelante a sus hijos para que tengan mejores oportunidades en la vida.
texts.en:
Regina is a married woman who is 33 years old. She lives with her five children, who are in school, in the Sololá department. She is the one on the left in the photograph.

She makes a living by making artisinal weaving in her home. She chose this activity because it is profitable, so she could earn money that would help her to contribute to her household economy. Now, she has realized that her products are even more marketable since she decided to form a group to make more artisanal weavings. Their goal is to improve their families' financial situations and to make the art more well-known. 

The loan will be used to purchase artisan materials to make these woven goods. Her greatest dream is to move her children forward so that they can have better opportunities in life.

loans.use: to purchase artisan goods to make woven products.

loans.name: María Transito

texts.es:
María de 59 años de edad, es una señora que se esfuerza por llevar el sustento diario a su familia, a pesar de no haberse preparado académicamente, se las arregla para generar ingresos, está casada y su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, pero esta actividad es solamente a nivel de subsistencia, por eso ella se las ingenia para tener los recursos que le permitan cubrir otras necesidades que hay en el hogar. Tiene dos hijos, pero ya son adultos y formaron su propio hogar.

 María  tiene  venta de panes rellenos, pasteles, papa frita, entre otros productos, esto lo hace los fines de semana y de lunes a viernes, trabaja como empleada en una granja vecina, ahí es la encargada de la vacunación de pollos. La granja se encuentra a dos cuadras de su casa. 

Utilizará el préstamo para comprar materia  prima (panes, pollos, maíz, repollo entre otras cosas,) para su negocio que atiende los fines de semana.  En este momento, quiere ampliar el negocio ya hay gran demanda de sus productos y no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para invertir.

Ella desea tener  una pequeña tienda, donde pueda asegurar los ingresos para cubrir con los gastos que se requieren en su hogar.
texts.en:
María is 59 years old. She is a woman who works hard to provide her family with their daily sustenance. In spite of her incomplete education, she has set things up so she can generate income. She is married, and her husband works in agriculture, but this activity is only at the subsistence level. For this reason, María has found creative ways to obtain the resources to cover other necessities in the household. She has two children, but they are already adults and have formed their own households. 

María has a business selling sandwiches, pastries, and fried potatoes, among other products. She does this on the weekends, and from Monday through Friday she works as an employee on a neighboring farm, where she is in charge of vaccinating the chickens. The farm is located two blocks from her house. 

She will use the loan to buy supplies (rolls, chicken, corn and cabbage, among other items), for her business which she operates on the weekends. At this time, she wants to expand the business, since there is a great demand for her products, and she does not have sufficient funds to invest.

She would like to have a small shop where she can be sure of earning the income to cover the necessary expenses in her household.

loans.use: to buy rolls, chicken, corn and cabbage, among other items, to prepare her chicken sandwiches.

loans.name: Qurbonali

texts.ru: Курбонали простой трудолюбивый и ответственный дехканин из района Восеъ. Ему 49 лет. Он женатый человек. Курбонали с женой воспитывают шестерых детей. Всю жизнь Курбонали работал и зарабатывал своим честным трудом. Несмотря на свой возраст, он трудится все время, чтобы прокормить свою семью. Курбонали на своем земельном участке выращивает пшеницу. Недавно он закончил посев, но чтобы получить богатый и качественный урожай, ему необходимо обработать землю минеральными удобрениями. Курбонали много средств вложил в посев урожая и ему не хватает немного денег для приобретения удобрений. По этой причине он обратился за кредитом. Помогите ему.
texts.en: Qurbonali is a simple, hardworking and responsible farmer from the Vose district.  He is 49 years old.  He is a married man.  Qurbonali and his wife are raising six children.  Qurbonali has been working and earning a living with honest work all of his life.  Despite his age, he works all the time in order to fed his family.  Qurbonali grows wheat on his land plot.  He recently finished his sowing, but in order to get a rich and quality harvest, he needs to treat the land with mineral fertilizers.  Qurbonali invested a lot of money into sowing the harvest and needs some more to purchase mineral fertilizers.  This is why he requested this loan.  Help him.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers to improve his harvest

loans.name: Regino

texts.es: Regino es una persona de 36 años de edad, tiene una hermosa familia de 7 hijos, de los cuales 5 son hombres y 2 mujeres, de todos ellos cuatro están estudiando; estudian por las mañanas y ayudan a su papa por las tardes. Don Regino y sus hijos viven actualmente en el Departamento de Sololá. El se dedica al oficio de la agricultura, como también se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en su tienda que se encuentra ubicada en su vivienda. Con los ingresos que obtiene de esta tienda le da sostenimiento a su familia y educación a sus hijos. Actualmente cuenta con  2 años de tener su tienda y tiene aceptable demanda de los vecinos de su comunidad. El quiere ampliar su tienda y es por ello que está solicitando un préstamo de Q 10,000.00 para la compra de abarrotes para darles un mejor servicio a sus clientes. El sueño más grande de don Regino es contar con un local en el centro de Sololá para poder vender más e incrementar sus ganancias para mejorar la economía de su familia.
texts.en:
Regino is 36 years of age and has a beautiful family with 7 children, 5 of whom are male and 2 are female. Of the total, 4 are in school, studying mornings and aiding their father afternoons. Regino and his children presently live in the Department of Solola. 

He is a farmer who also sells groceries in his store, located in his home. With the income he derives from this store, Regino maintains his family and educates his children. He now has 2 years experience with his store and there is acceptable demand among the neighbors in his community. He now wishes to expand his store and for that reason he is soliciting a loan of 10,000 Quetzals to purchase groceries and offer better service to his customers.

Regino's biggest dream is to establish a store in the center of Solola, to be able to sell more and increase his earnings, thereby improving his family's economy.

loans.use: to buy groceries to stock his store.

loans.name: Wilde

texts.es: Wilde tiene 36 años está casada con Yolanda y tiene 3 hijos que viven junto a el en su vivienda propia hecha a base de material noble. Wilde se dedica a la reparación de motores mayores como motos lineales y mototaxis convirtiéndose en un técnico muy conocido por su eficiente servicio. Con el paso de los años y buscando obtener mayores ingresos económicos por la responsabilidad familiar que tenía decidió poner su propio taller en la casa que logro construir iniciando se de a pocos con la visita de clientes que posteriormente fueron convirtiéndose en sus fieles usuarios. Gracias a la buena afluencia de clientes que concurrían a su negocio logró poner además una pequeña tienda donde vende repuestos para sus reparaciones ofreciendo así un completo servicio técnico. Uno de sus principales objetivos a largo plazo es de mejorar su taller con equipos mas sofisticados para brindar servios complejos y a la vez poner una sucursal en otro punto de su localidad. Desea en esta oportunidad contar con 2,000 nuevos soles para la compra de repuestos menores para surtir su pequeña tienda que abastece su taller técnico.
texts.en: Wilde is 36 years old and married to Yolanda. He has three children who live together with him in his own home, which is constructed from solid materials. Wilde dedicates himself to repairing motors, such of those of motorcycles and moto-taxis. He has become a very well-known technician thanks to his efficient service. Over the years, in the quest for a better income due to his family responsibilities, he decided to set up his own workshop in the house he was able to build. He started little by little with visits from customers who later became his loyal clientele. Thanks to his customers' good level of affluence, he was also able to set up a small store where he sells spare parts for his repairs, thus offering complete technical services. One of his main long-term goals is to improve his workshop with more sophisticated equipment, in order to provide more complicated services. He would also like to open up a branch in another part of his town. On this occasion, he would like to have access to 2,000 Peruvian new soles to buy small spare parts to stock the little store that supplies his technical workshop.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to stock his business.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
Su nombre es Sandra los orígenes están basados en el respeto, solidaridad, lealtad, sinceridad, responsabilidad  y lucha creciente por cumplir  los sueños para un futuro,  ser una profesional  y conformar un hogar. Ella vive con los padres,  es la segunda de 4 hermanos y la única  que ha terminado de estudiar y de la cual esperan  que se supere y salga adelante con  una carrera profesional, la madre se dedica los oficios del hogar y el padre es minero.  
 Culmino los estudios secundarios hace 6 años y se dedica a trabajar,  en las labores se caracteriza por ser amable, trabajadora sociable, responsable y amigable, trabaja Para cooperar  en el hogar económicamente  ya que no contaba con medios necesarios y suficientes para seguir los sueños y metas. Pero hoy en día, con esfuerzo y dedicación quiere ampliar los conocimientos al realizar la carrera de administración hotelera con la cual quiere aumentar los ingresos y crecer como persona y mujer.
En la vida laboral  como administradora busca integridad, independencia, respeto con los colegas, competencia de superación, y conducta en la ética. Por tal motivo solicita el convenio con kiva para realizar el técnico en administración hotelera,  ya que los  ingresos son pocos y les aporta a la mamá económicamente para los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Her name is Sandra, and the foundations of her life are respect, solidarity, loyalty, sincerity, responsibility, and a growing struggle to fulfill her dreams for the future, to be a professional and form a home. She lives with her parents. She is the second of 4 siblings, and the only one who has completed school. Her family hopes that she will get ahead and succeed with a professional career. Her mother dedicates herself to the household, and her father is a miner.   

She finished secondary school 6 years ago and began working. In her work, she is known for being friendly, hard-working, sociable, responsible and likable. She works in order to contribute economically to the household, since she did not have the necessary and sufficient means to continue with her dreams and goals. However today, with effort and dedication, she wants to expand her knowledge by studying for a degree in hotel management, with which she wants to increase her income and grow as a person and as a woman. 

In her working life as an administrator, she seeks integrity, independence, respect among colleagues, the ability to improve, and ethical conduct. For this reason, she is requesting the arrangement with Kiva to pursue training in hotel administration, since her income is low and she provides economic resources to her mother for the household expenses.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of study.

loans.name: Irina

texts.ru:
Родители Ирины оставили ей в наследство дом, учили трудиться на земле. Выращиванием овощей Ирина занимается самостоятельно  уже  более 10 лет. В селе это самый прибыльный бизнес. На участке есть 4 теплицы, в дальнейшем Ирина планирует построить еще две.  Ирина надеялась с осеннего урожая приобрести всё необходимое для нового сезона, но погодные условия помешали  ей это сделать. Только началась массовая торговля огурцами и всё померзло, поэтому заработали не много. 

Ирина знает, куда можно обратиться за помощью,  в прошлом году она обращалась за кредитом.  Сейчас уже пришло время сеять, поэтому очень нужны дополнительные средства. Ирина благодарит, за оказанную помощь и надеется на дальнейшее сортрудничество.
texts.en: Irina's parents left her a house in their will and taught her to work on the land.  Irina has been involved in growing vegetables independently for over 10 years already.  This is the most profitable business in the village.  She has 4 greenhouses on the land and plans to build two more.  Irina hoped to use the autumn harvest to purchase everything necessary for the new season, but weather conditions prevented her from doing this.  Just when the wide sales of cucumber began, everything froze, and this is why they did not earn a lot.  Irina knows where to come for help since she requested a loan last year.  The time has come to sow and this is why she really needs additional means.  Irina is grateful for the provided help and hopes for a future partnership.

loans.use: to cover her greenhouses in a double-layer film and buy high-quality seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Samit

texts.en: Samit is 58 years old. She is married and resides with five children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been cultivating rice and fattening up animals for more than ten years, earning approximately $2 per day. Her husband helps her run the business. Four of her children are employed. They earn about $14 each day. Due to lack of funds, Samit is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase fertilizer to use for her farming. In addition, a part of this money is used to pay for her child’s tuition fee. This money will help her crops grow well and provide high yield. In the future, she would like to expand her farming business and help her child earn a bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer to use for her farming

loans.name: Teresa De Jesús

texts.es:
Teresa de 36 años de edad, Casada y madre de tres hijos, es una mujer que aprovecha las oportunidades de negocio, no pudo estudiar mucho, pero  ella siempre con las ganas de mejorar sus condiciones va esforzándose día con día, llevando adelante sus hijos, ellos se encuentran estudiando y su esposo trabaja como jornalero en una granja de pollos del cantón. 

La señora tiene crianza de gallinas para la venta, hay épocas donde los precios son buenos, pero su principal fuente de ingresos es una pequeña tienda que tiene, entre los productos que vende tiene: pan, gaseosas, frutas, verduras…etc,. Esta tienda la tiene desde hace dos años, donde vive y transitan muchas personas y al ver esta oportunidad ella estableció este negocio, el cual le ha dado buenos resultados.

El crédito lo utilizara, en la compra de un refrigerador, este se lo venden a un precio cómodo, pero en estos momentos no cuenta con la totalidad de la cantidad que le piden, queriendo aprovechar esta oportunidad  ha decidido solicitar el préstamo, que ira pagando poco a poco con lo que le genere el negocio.

Su sueño es ver a sus hijos convertidos en profesionales, que puedan estudiar y que tengan las mejores condiciones en sus vidas, espera que con el esfuerzo de su esposo y ella poder sacarlos adelante.
texts.en:
Teresa is 36 years old, married, and the mother of three children. She is a woman who takes advantage of business opportunities. She wasn't able to go far in school, but she is always eager to improve her situation and is doing her very best day by day, raising her children. They go to school and her husband works as a day laborer on a local chicken farm. 

She raises chickens for sale. There are times of year when the prices are good, but her main source of income is a small store that she has. Among the products she sells are: bread, soft drinks, fruit, vegetables etc. She has had the store for two years. Where she lives, there are many passersby, and seeing this opportunity,  she set up this business, which has given her good results. 

She will use the loan to purchase a refrigerator. This is being sold at an affordable price, but at this time she doesn't have all of the asking price.  Wanting to take advantage of this opportunity, she has decided to request a loan, which she will pay back little by little with what the store generates. 

Her dream is to see her children become professionals, that they can go to school, and have the best circumstances in their lives.
She hopes that with the effort of her and her husband she can help them get ahead in life.

loans.use: To buy a refrigerator, which she will use to stock the store with products that require refrigeration.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve the water connections and drains

loans.name: Manzura

texts.ru:
Это Манзура. Она жительница района Рудаки, ей 58 лет. Она многодетная мать, у нее шестеро детей. Ее муж работает председателем махалли. Махалля - это квартал или микрорайон, жители которого осуществляют местное самоуправление путём выбора комитета махалли и его председателя, которые в свою очередь решают вопросы организации быта и досуга жителей своей махалли, а также несут ответственность перед вышестоящими органами городского управления за обеспечение правопорядка в своей махалле. 
Манзура тоже трудится наравне мужа. Она на протяжении 27 лет занимается торговлей. У нее есть своя торговая точка на рынке, где она занимается продажей женской одежды. Манзура, чтобы увеличить сезонный товар и спрос на них, просит кредит. Она собирается привезти коллекцию зимней теплой женской одежды и таким образом увеличить товарооборот. Она нуждается в данном кредите, так как ее собственных средств недостаточно.
texts.en:
This is Manzura. She is a resident of the Rudaki region. She is 58 years old. She is the mother of many children, she has six of them. Her husband works as the chairman of their makhalla. The makhalla is a block or a micro-region, where the residents select the local authority through electing the makhalla's committee and its chairman, who in turn decides questions on life, organization and leisure of the inhabitants of the makhalla. They also take the responsibility towards the municipal government responsible for law enforcement in the makhalla. 

Manzura also works, just like her husband. She has worked with retail for 27 years. She has her sales point at the market, where she sells women's clothing. In order to increase the amount of seasonal goods and the demand for them, Manzura requests a loan. She has decided to bring in a collection of warm women's winter clothing and this way increase her turnover. She needs this loan as her own resources are not sufficient.

loans.use: to purchase warm women's winter clothing to sell

loans.name: María Dora

texts.es:
María de 65 años de edad, se casó a sus 15 años nunca fue a la escuela aprendió por sus propios medios a leer y escribir, tuvo 10 hijos de los que murieron 3;  2 cuando eran bebes y uno de 33 años de edad. Ella vive junto a sus tres nietos, de los que dos de ellos estudian y el otro trabaja en la agricultura.

La señora se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a cuidar unos cerdos que dice la ayudan a distraerse, ella  recibe remesas de estados unidos, que algunos de sus hijos le envían para sus gastos.

El crédito lo necesita, para comprar granos básicos ya que en esta época de cosecha es mucho más cómodo el precio,  para ella y de alguna manera le ayuda, los granos los necesita para consumo y alimento de animales domésticos.

Ella desea con que sus nietos estudien y sean profesionales para que no sufran todo lo que ella ha tenido que sufrir por no tener un nivel académico. El crédito le ayudara a comprar los granos a muy bajo costo por la época de cosecha.
texts.en:
María is 65 years old. She was married at 15 and never went to school. She learned to read and write on her own and had 10 children, of which three died; two when they were babies and one at 33. She lives with her three grandchildren, two of whom go to school and the other works in agriculture. She does household chores and looks after some pigs, which she says gives her something to do.

She receives remittances from the United States, which some of her children send her for her expenses. She needs the loan to buy staple grains, as at this harvest time of year the price is much more affordable for her. She needs the grains for her own use and to feed farm animals. 

She wishes to see her grandchildren go to school and be professionals, so that they don't suffer everything she has had to suffer, through not having an education. The loan will help her to buy the grains at very low cost because it being harvest time.

loans.use: To buy staple grains, since at this harvest time of year, the price is much more affordable.

loans.name: Yenny Erlinda

texts.es:
Yenny de 37 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar,  ella comenzó a trabajar en casa cuando apenas tenía 11 años,  es madre soltera tiene 4 hijas entre los 8 y 16 años 3 de ellas estudian y la otra le ayuda en los quehaceres del hogar.
Ella tiene un negocio de merienda, que cuando no tiene trabajo en casa permanente ella se dedica a este negocio, para generar ingresos.  Ella siempre ha tenido que trabajar para mantener a sus 4 hijas, el negocio lo tiene en casa y a veces manda a sus hijas a vender.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar insumos para elaborar más variedad de meriendas y para cubrir algunos gastos estudiantiles.
Sueña con que sus hijas lleguen a ser profesionales  y el trabajo sea diferente que el que ella desempeña a diario.
texts.en:
Yenny, 37 years old, did not have the opportunity to study. She started working at home when she was hardly 11 years old. She is a single mother and has 4 daughters between 8 and 16 years of age. Three of them study and the other one helps her with household chores.

She has a business selling snacks, and when she does not have permanent domestic work, she works at this business in order to generate income. She has always had to work to support her 4 daughters. She has the business in her home and sometimes she sends her children to sell. The loan she is requesting is to buy supplies to make a greater variety of snacks and to cover some school expenses.

She dreams of her daughters becoming professionals and of work being different than that which she does every day.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make a greater variety of snacks and to cover some school expenses

loans.name: Kang

texts.en: Kang is a married woman with one child. She is a farmer and her husband is a charcoal and firewood seller. Both of them earn around $12 per day. In order to expand her husband’s business, she would like to take out a loan of $1,500 for buying a hand tractor to transport charcoal and firewood. This loan is very important as the hand tractor will be very useful for developing her husband’s business and this business is the big gateway to gaining income for her family. She hopes that in the future she can buy more charcoal and firewood for the business and build the gate of her house.

loans.use: To buy a hand tractor to transport charcoal and firewood

loans.name: Katerin

texts.es:
Ella es katerin, una joven de 26 años estudia cosmetología y estética integral, en este momento no tiene todos los recursos económicos para poder financiar la carrera, por eso aparte del trabajo diario hace masajes a domicilio a los amigos y allegados para solventar ciertos gastos de la carrera y vida personal. 
Siempre quiso estudiar estética, pero las posibilidades no le favorecieron en aquel momento, vive en un barrio del sur de la ciudad donde ha vivido toda la vida junto a los padres y 6 hermanos, siempre le ha gustado el tema de la estética y la belleza ya que le parece que ayudar a las personas  a verse y sentirse mucho mejor es muy gratificante,  ya  que gracias al trabajo y a lo que puede hacer con las manos puede mejorar el autoestima de la gente al mirarse y ver que en realidad esto si funciona para el bien de ellos mismos y por la salud, aquella joven está logrando un sueño que tenía hace mucho tiempo, al poder realizarse como  esteticista profesional, ya que con esta carrera que siempre le ha gustado podría tener una mejor estabilidad económica y personal, podría ampliar las relaciones laborales y así hacer reconocer mucho mas el trabajo y ampliar los ingresos económicos para poder ayudar mucho más a la familia y cubrir todas las necesidades, por esta razón necesita el convenio de kiva , para facilitar el pago mensual de este, ya que con lo que trabaja a diario no le alcanzaría a cubrir toda la cuota mensual de la carrera al valor normal, de ante mano ella agradece por la atención y la colaboración.
texts.en:
This is Katerin. She is 26 years old and is studying to be an beauty therapist. She does not currently have all the money to be able to pay for her studies and, so, as well as her day job, she offers massages at home to her friends and family. This helps her to cover some of the costs of her studies and her personal life.

Katerin always wanted to study to be a beautician but the circumstances were never right. Katerin lives in a barrio south of Bogotá. She has always lived with her parents and six siblings. Katerin has always like things related to aesthetics and beauty as she sees the work as a way to help people to look and feel much better, which is very gratifying.. Thanks to this work and her skilled manual abilities, Katerin can improve people's self-esteem and they can see that this is good for them and for their health. Katerin is working to achieve a long-held dream of becoming a professional beautician. With these studies, Katerina wants to enjoy more financial and personal stability. She wants to increase her working relations, learn much more about her job, and increase her income in order to help her family and cover necessary costs.

To do this, Katherin needs a Kiva loan, in order to make her monthly payments for her course. Her work in not enough to cover the full price of her studies. Katerin thanks you in advance for your attention and for your help.

loans.use: Para pagar un semestre de matricula

loans.name: Ana Lucia Del Pilar

texts.es: Ana Lucia tiene 17 años es estudiante de Auxiliar de Educación Inicial en una  Universidad local, escogió esta profesión porque le gusta interactuar con los niños. Ana Lucia recién ha empezado su carrera lleva estudiando 5 meses y a pesar que el camino es largo está muy entusiasmada con sus estudios. En el futuro le gustaría trabajar en una  escuela prestigiosa y trabajar con niños que es su especialidad, el préstamo solicitado le servirá para el pago de las mensualidades de un ciclo en la universidad y con otra parte podrá comprar materiales de estudio. Agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por este préstamo que es muy importante para su futuro y le gustaría que muchos jóvenes como ella tengan la misma oportunidad.
texts.en: Ana Lucia is 17 years old and is studying at a local university to be an early childhood education aide. She chose this profession because she likes to interact with children. Ana Lucia has recently started her program. She has been studying for 5 months, and despite the fact that it's a long road, she is very enthusiastic about her studies. In the future she would like to work at a prestigious school and work with children, which is her specialty. The loan requested will help her to pay for the monthly expenses for one term at the university, and with the rest she will buy study materials. She thanks the Kiva investors for this loan, which is very important for her future, and she would like for many young people like herself to have the same opportunity.

loans.use: to pay school fees and buy study materials

loans.name: Askar

texts.ru: Аскар живет в районе Мастчох города Худжанд. Ему 32 года, он семьянин и отец двух мальчиков, которым по 4 и 3 года. У Аскара большая семья. Вместе с ними также живут его два братья, мать, две невестки и сестра. Аскар вместе с братьями занимается скотоводством. Они в течение 5 лет разводят крупнорогатый скот для продажи. Это семейный бизнес с основным источником дохода семьи. Здесь многие жители его района зарабатывают таким путем. Аскар сейчас просит кредит, чтобы приобрести пару молодых бычков для развития семейного бизнеса. С помощью кредита он сможет увеличить поголовье скота и в дальнейшем получить хорошую прибыль от продаж скотов, который он планирует потратить на улучшение жизненных условий семьи.
texts.en:
Askar lives in the city of Khujand in the Mastchoh region. He is 32 years old, a family man and the father of two young boys, who are 4 and 3 years old. Askar has a large family. Two of Askar's brothers, his mother, two sisters-in-law and his sister live together with them. 

Askar and his brothers work with livestock breeding. For a period of five years they have bred cattle to sell. The family business is the main source of income for the family. Many of the residents of the region earn money this way. 

Askar currently requests a loan in order to purchase some young bull-calves to develop the family business. With the help of the loan he will be able to increase the number of cattle. Further he will receive a good income from selling the cattle, which he plans to spend on improving the living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to purchase some young bull-calves to develop his family business

loans.name: Bazarkul

texts.ru: Базаркул 40 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Базаркул - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Базаркул занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 14 лет назад, с покупки скота на 8,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Базаркул, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 5 дойных  коров и 10 овец, также обрабатывает 0,90 ГА земли, где в основном выращивает кукурузу и хлопок. Дополнительно Базаркул на местном рынке держит пункт общественного питания, где готовит и реализует блюда восточной кухни. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Базаркул обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Базаркул планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение детей.
texts.en:
Bazarkul is 40 years old, married and raising three children together with her husband. Bazarkul has secondary education. As a main income for her family, Bazarkul works with livestock breeding and field crop cultivation, after having started 14 years ago with the purchase of livestock for 8,000 som (KGS). 

Thanks to Bazarkul's persistent work, her farm currently has five dairy cows and 10 sheep. She also processes 0.90 hectares of land, on which she grows sweet corn and cotton. In addition, Bazarkul has a food stall at the local market, where she prepares and sells dishes from the oriental kitchen. The total monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS). 

With an aim to further develop her business, Bazarkul turned to the bank "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan to purchase sheep to increase the number of livestock. Bazarkul plans to invest the income from the loan in further increasing the number of livestock. She also plans to save money for the future education of her children.

loans.use: to purchase sheep

loans.name: Yeredon Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe YEREDON est composé de femmes mariées, elles ont en moyenne 44ans et 4 enfants. Elles vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles dans le village de TONGA commune de Wacoro
préfecture de Dioila, Région de Koulikoro (deuxième région administrative de la République du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d’amitié. Elles font le commerce de céréales,  de condiments et du poisson. Les femmes du groupe YEREDON sont à leur troisième prêt solidaire.  Dans le but de satisfaire la demande énormes de la clientèle, elles font recours à SORO YIRIWASO. Ces montants seront utilisés pour acheter leurs marchandises déjà citées.
 La cliente MAGNE FIMA  première personne à partir de la droite dans le rang debout est une  vendeuse de poisson fumé. Elle compte acheter  2 paniers de poisson fumé à Fana chez les grossistes. La vente se fait en détail au marché journalier du village à une clientèle composée de femmes et d’homme. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 10 000FCFA. Ce bénéfice est réinjecté dans son activité.
texts.en:
The group YEREDON is composed of married women, who average 44 years of age and 4 children each. They all live in traditional families in the village of TONGA, in Commune de Wacoro, Préfecture de Dioila, Région de Koulikoro (2nd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The women know one another through ties of kinship, community, and friendship. They do commerce in grains, condiments, and fish.  

The women of the group YEREDON are on their third solidarity loan. With the goal of satisfying the enormous customer demand, they turn to the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso. The funds borrowed will be used to purchase their goods, as cited above.

This client, MAGNE FIMA, the first person standing at the right, is a vendor of smoked fish. She intends to purchase 2 baskets of smoked fish from wholesalers in Fana. Sales are made retail to a customer base composed of men and women at the daily village market. She plans on making a monthly profit of 10,000 francs CFA that is reinvested in her business.

loans.use: to purchase smoked fish

loans.name: Nargis

texts.ru:
Наргис 37-летняя замужняя женщина с упорным и решительным характером. Хотя у нее высшее образование, но в данный момент по профессии не работает. Наргис занята в сфере торговли. У нее имеется магазин женской одежды в торговом центре. Наргис открыла свой бизнес в 2006 году и по сей день продолжает его. Она очень искусный продавец и знает как обращаться с клиентами. За счет кредита Наргис хочет закупить коллекцию сезонной женской одежды и увеличить товарооборот. 
Наргис любящая жена и мать двоих детей, проживающая со своей семьей в районе Рудаки. У нее есть сын и дочь школьного возраста. Семья для нее стимул жизни. Она работает усердно во благо семьи.
texts.en:
Nargis is a 37 years old, married woman with a persistent and determined character. Although she has higher education, she currently does not work with her profession. Nargis works in the area of sales. She has a women's clothing store at a shopping center. Nargis opened her business in 2006 and has continued it to this day. She is a very skillful saleswoman and knows how to treat customers. 

With the loan, Nargis would like to purchase a collection of seasonal women's clothing and increase her turnover. Nargis is a loving wife and mother of two children, who lives with her family in the Rudaki region. She has a son and a daughter of school age. Her family is the main impulse in her life. She works hard for her family's benefit.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal women's clothing to develop her sales

loans.name: Tepeko

texts.en:
Tepeko is 49 years old and married. He supports a family of five children. He is a wheat farmer and has been in this business for the last nine years with a monthly income of KES. 32,000. 

He is servicing his fifth loan of KES. 75,000 from VisionFund Kenya, and this will facilitate him in preparation of the farm and the purchase of farm inputs.

He hopes to use anticipated profits to expand his farm and reinvest. His future dreams are to improve the family's living standards and educate his children

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs

loans.name: Valentina

texts.ru:
Валентина родилась в селе Водяное, когда выросла поступила учиться в ВУЗ в Харькове, потом   вышла замуж, родились двое детей. 14 лет назад умер ее отец  и  в наследство  остался дом. Решили с мужем переехать жить в село, стали развивать сельское хозяйство. 

Валентина с мужем много трудились и это дало свои результаты.  Они приобрели еще один участок земли, построили теплицы, провели отопление. Валентина уверенна, чтобы иметь успех нужно ответственно относиться к работе и не останавливаться на достигнутом. Поэтому в этом году они  с мужем решили установить еще две теплицы. Одну построили за свои средства ,а для второй обратились за кредитом. Пока есть возможность хотели бы  как можно больше помочь детям.
texts.en: Valentina was born in the Vodyanoe village, studied in a university in Kharkhov when she grew up, then got married and had two children.  Her father died 14 years ago and left her a house.  She and her husband decided to move and live in the village and started to develop an agricultural business.  Valentina and her husband worked hard and this brought good results.  They bought another plot of land, built greenhouses, installed heating.  Valentina is certain that in order to have success, work has to be treated responsibly and one cannot stop with what has been achieved.  This is why this year, she and her husband decided to install two more greenhouses.  They built one with their own means and requested a loan for the second one.  While they have the ability, they want to help their children as much as possible.

loans.use: to build one more greenhouse

loans.name: Garimad

texts.ru:
Гаримад является жителем района Фархор в возрасте 55 лет. Он начинает бизнес по купле и продаже крупнорогатых скотов. Гаримад в настоящее время занимается растениеводством. Он на 3 га земельного участка выращивает овощи и другие сельскохозяйственные культуры. Ему помогает семья. Гаримад женат и у него шестеро детей - две дочери и четверо сыновей. 
Гаримад теперь планирует параллельно заняться выращиванием крупнорогатого скота. Он считает животноводство хорошим бизнесом со стабильным доходом. Он имеет коровник и корм для скота. Чтобы купить бычков Гаримад обратился за кредитом и надеется на финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Garimad is a resident of the Farkhor region. He is 55 years old. He is starting a business of buying and reselling cattle. Garimad currently works with field crop cultivation. He grows vegetables and other crops on 3 hectares of land. His family helps him. Garimad is married and has six children - two daughters and four sons. 

Garimad currently plans to work with cattle breeding in parallel. He thinks cattle breeding is a great business with a stable income. He has a cow-shed and fodder for the cattle. In order to purchase bull-calves, Garimad applied for a loan and hopes for financial support.

loans.use: to purchase two heads of cattle

loans.name: Nai

texts.en: Nai is a married woman with three children, living in Kampong Speu Province. She is a housewife, her husband is a carthorse rider, her two children are factory laborers, and her youngest child is a student. All of them can earn around $13.75 per day. Now, she would like to apply for a loan of $1,500 for renovating her house. She hopes she can enlarge her house more and her youngest kid can get a diploma.

loans.use: To renovate her house

loans.name: Oysara

texts.ru: Ойсара прекрасная женщина с тонким чувством юмора. Она родилась в 1976 году. Ойсара разведена и имеет 2 детей. Ойсара более 17 лет занимается шитьем женской одежды. Она имеет своих постоянных клиентов благодаря хорошему сервису. Ойсара является повторной клиенткой ИМОН. Она имеет хорошее кредитное досье. Ойсара хочет развевать свой бизнес. Она нуждается в новой швейной машинке. Ойсара запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки новой швейной машинки. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Oysara is a lovely woman with a good sense of humor. She was born in 1976. Oysara is divorced and has two children. For more than 17 years she has worked with sewing women's clothing. She has returning customers thanks to her good service.

Oysara is a repeat client of IMON. She has a good credit history. She would like to develop her business. She needs a new sewing machine. Oysara requests a loan in the amount of 5,000 somoni to purchase a new sewing machine. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine

loans.name: Sokhom

texts.en: Sokhom is a resident living in Prey Chhor district, Kampong Cham province. She is 47 years old and married with seven children who are various ages. Sokhom is involved in the agricultural sector and has 30 years' experience in this field. She has managed around one hectare of farm for rice cultivation. The income from farming is barely enough to cover her daily living costs, so Sokhom aims to enlarge her farming areas and make her business for productivity. Due to inadequate capital, she is asking for a loan in the amount of USD 1,000 to buy a plot of land for tilling rice. She hopes that lenders will not reject her loan, which will give her positive impacts on developing her general living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land for tilling rice.

loans.name: Teriya Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe TERIYA est composé de femmes mariées qui ont en moyenne 35 ans et 4 enfants. Elles vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles dans le village de TONGA commune de Wacoro
préfecture de Dioila, Région de Koulikoro (deuxième région administrative de la République du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d’amitié. Elles font le commerce de céréales, boula, parfum, et autres articles divers. Les femmes du groupe TERIYA sont à leur deuxième prêt solidaire. Et dans le but de satisfaire la demande énormes de la clientèle ont fait recours à SORO YIRIWASO. 
La cliente MAKONO la troisième personne à partir de la droite dans le rang debout n’est pas instruite. Elle est actuellement vendeuse de teinture (boula) au village de Tonga depuis deux ans, chose qu’elle a apprise lors d’une visite de sa tante à Ségou. Elle compte acheter un gros paquet de boula et 2 paquets de sachets en plastiques chez les grossistes à Bamako. Elle les attache dans les plastiques. La vente se fait en détail au marché et à la maison à une clientèle mixte. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 8500FCFA. Ce bénéfice sera réinjecté dans l’activité.
texts.en:
The group TERIYA is composed of married women, who average 35 years of age and 4 children each. They all live in traditional families in the village of TONGA, in Commune de Wacoro, Préfecture de Dioila, Région de Koulikoro (2nd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The women know one another through ties of kinship, community, and friendship. They do commerce in grains, 'boula', perfume, and general merchandise.  

The women of the group TERIYA are on their second solidarity loan. With the goal of satisfying the enormous customer demand, they turn to the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso. 

This client, MAKONO, the third person standing from the right, is uneducated. She is currently a vendor of dyes (boula), a business of two years that she learned when visiting her aunt in Ségou. She intends to purchase a large packet of boula and 2 packets of plastic bags from wholesalers in Bamako. She zips up the dyes in the bags. Sales are made retail to a mixed customer base at the market and at the house. She plans on making a monthly profit of 8,500 francs CFA which is reinvested in her business.

loans.use: to purchase dyes

loans.name: Yuryi

texts.ru:
У Юрия большая, дружная семья. У него пятеро детей и все они живут в селе В. Знаменка, в своем доме. Чтобы обеспечить свою семью, Юрию приходится много трудиться и это  ему в радость, так как он очень любит свою жену и детей. Особенно болит сердце отца за дочь, она инвалид детства и родители стараются, создать все условия для нормальной жизни.

Семья вместе трудится на своем участке, у них есть большие теплицы. Выращивает Юрий   помидоры и это у него хорошо получается. С каждым годом бизнес растет. Как и в прошлом году, в этом году Юрий строит дополнительную арочную теплицу.
 
Немного не хватило  средств достроить эту теплицу, поэтому Юрий опять обратился за кредитом. На полученные средства он закупит арматуру.  Теперь весной, он сможет больше посадить помидор. Старшая дочь учится в институте, сын женился, Юрий хочет помочь своим детям начать взрослую жизнь и дать им хороший старт.
texts.en: Yuryi has a large, friendly family.  He has five children and all of them live in the V. Znamenka village in their own house.  In order to provide for his family, Yuryi has to work a lot, which he is happy to do because he loves his wife and children very much.  His heart especially aches for his daughter, who has been disabled since childhood, and the parents try to provide all of the necessary conditions for a normal life.  The family works together on their land, where they have large greenhouses.  Yuryi grows tomatoes and can do it well.  The business grows every year.  Just like last year, Yuryi is building an additional arched greenhouse.  He did not have enough money to finish building this greenhouse, and this is why Yuryi requested a loan again.  He will use the loan to purchase metal rods.  Now he can plant tomatoes in the spring.  His oldest daughter attends a university, and son got married.  Yuryi wants to help his children to begin their adult lives and provide them with a good start.

loans.use: to purchase metal rods to build a new greenhouse

loans.name: Hafiza

texts.ru:
Хафиза 35-летняя замужняя женщина из района Ч.Расулова города Худжанд. У нее двое детей в возрасте 4 и 7 лет, старший ходит в школу, а младший в детский сад. Ее муж является водителем грузовой машины КАМАЗ и занимается транспортировкой больших грузов. 
Хафиза, как многие сельские женщины занимается и растениеводством и животноводством. Она на своем земельном участке выращивает сельскохозяйственные культуры, а также разводит коров и бычков для продажи. Хафиза занята в этих сферах более 13 лет. Она просит кредит в размере 2300 долларов США. Часть кредита она собирается использовать для купли минеральных удобрений, чтобы весной получить качественный урожай, а на остальную часть приобрести крупнорогатый скот, чтобы увеличить поголовье скота. Этот кредит ей очень важен.
texts.en:
Hafiza is a 35 years old and married woman from the city of Khujand in the Ch. Rasulov region. She has two children of the ages of 4 and 7. The eldest one goes to school and the youngest is in kindergarten. Her husband is a truck driver and works with heavy transport. 

Hafiza, like many village women, works both with field crop cultivation and livestock breeding. She grows crops on her plot of land, and also breeds cows and bulls for selling. Hafiza has worked in this area for more than 13 years. 

Hafiza requests a loan in the amount of 2,300 US dollar. She has decided to use part of the loan for purchasing mineral fertilizers in order to receive a quality spring harvest. The remaining part she will use to purchase cattle, in order to increase their number. This loan is very important to her.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers and also to purchase cattle for breeding

loans.name: Sabaly Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe SABALY est composé de femmes mariées elles ont en moyenne 35 ans et 4 enfants. Elles vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles dans le village de TONGA commune de Wacoro
préfecture de Dioila, Région de Koulikoro (deuxième région administrative de la République du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d’amitié. Les femmes du groupe SABALY sont à leur cinquième  prêt solidaire. Dans le but de satisfaire la demande de la clientèle, elles font  recours à SORO YIRIWASO. 
 La cliente OUMOU la première personne à partir de la gauche dans le rang debout est analphabète. Elle est actuellement vendeuse de cacahouète  au village de Tonga depuis quatre ans. Elle compte acheter un sac d’arachide non décortiqué avec les paysans de Tonga village et le transformer  en cacahouète. Elle se promène pour vendre ses cacahouètes à une clientèle mixte. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 8000FCFA. Ce bénéfice sera utilisé dans l’élevage de petits animaux.
texts.en:
The group SABALY is composed of married women, who average 35 years of age and 4 children each. They all live in traditional families in the village of TONGA, in Commune de Wacoro, Préfecture de Dioila, Région de Koulikoro (2nd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The women know one another through ties of kinship, community, and friendship. 

The women of the group SABALY are on their fifth solidarity loan. To satisfy the enormous customer demand, they turn to the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso. 

This client, OUMOU, the first person standing at the left, is illiterate. She has been a vendor of whole peanuts in the village of Tonga for four years. She intends to purchase a sacks of unshelled peanuts from peasant farmers of the village and processes them. She walks from place to place selling the peanuts to a mixed customer base. She plans on making a monthly profit of 8,000 francs CFA. This profit will be used for raising small animals.

loans.use: to purchase peanuts

loans.name: Ne'matullo

texts.ru:
Этого холостого молодого человека зовут Неъматулло. Ему 25 лет. У него среднее образование. Неъматулло живет с отцом, матерью, сестрой и младшим братом в районе Восеъ. Он работает в стройке, а также последние 4 года занимается животноводством. Неъматулло в закупе, откармливании и продаже скотов помогают его отец и брат. В основном их семья выращивает крупнорогатый скот мясной породы. Ремесло скотоводство им передается из поколения к поколению. 
Сейчас Неъматулло берет кредит, чтобы купить бычков для увеличения поголовья скота. Он надеется на финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: The name of this single young man is Ne'matullo.  He is 25 years old.  He has a secondary education.  Ne'matullo lives with his father, mother, sister and younger brother in the Vose district.  He works at a construction site and also has been involved in animal husbandry for the last 4 years.  His father and brother help him with buying, fattening up and selling livestock.  The family primarily raises cattle for meat.  The animal husbandry trade has been passed on from generation to generation.  Now Ne'matullo is requesting this loan to buy bulls and increase livestock headcount.  He hopes for the financial support.

loans.use: to buy bulls and increase livestock headcount

loans.name: Sameth

texts.en:
Sameth is 39 years old. She is a married woman with two children, living in Kampong Speu Province. She is a housewife and her husband is a construction foreman. Their income is USD 16.66 per day. 

Now, Sameth would like to apply for loan of USD 1,000 to buy boards (for building pillars) for construction. This loan makes it easier her husband to construct houses for his clients. She hopes her husband’s business is much more developed and then she can renovate her house. Last but not least, her children can get a bachelors degree in the future.

loans.use: to buy a boards ( for building pillars) for construction.

loans.name: Gneta Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe GNETA est composé de femmes mariées qui ont en moyenne 35 ans et 4 enfants. Elles vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles dans le village de TONGA commune de Wacoro
préfecture de Dioila, Région de Koulikoro (deuxième région administrative de la République du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d’amitié. Elles font le commerce de condiments et produit de premières nécessités dans les étalages. Les femmes du groupe GNETA sont à leur cinquième  prêt solidaire. Ces montants seront utilisés pour acheter leurs marchandises déjà citées. 
La cliente KOMBA la deuxième personne à partir de la gauche dans le rang debout n’a pas été à l’école. Elle fait actuellement  le commerce de savons en liquide au village de Tonga depuis quatre ans, chose qu’elle a apprise lors de ses voyages à Bamako. Elle compte acheter 5 gros paquets de savon en poudre auprès d’une grossiste à Fana pour les transformer en savon liquide. La vente se fait de façon ambulante et en espèce à une clientèle mixte. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 17500FCFA. Ce bénéfice sera utilisé pour la scolarité des enfants.
texts.en:
The group GNETA is composed of married women, who average 35 years of age and 4 children each. They all live in traditional families in the village of TONGA, in Commune de Wacoro, Préfecture de Dioila, Région de Koulikoro (2nd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The women know one another through ties of kinship, community, and friendship. They do commerce in condiments and essential shop goods. 

The women of the group GNETA are on their fifth solidarity loan. These funds are used to purchase their goods, as cited above.

This client, KOMBA, the second person standing from the left, did not go to school. She has been a vendor of liquid soaps in the village of Tonga for four years. It is a business she learned during her trips to Bamako. She intends to purchase 5 large packets of soap powder from wholesalers in Fana and then process the powder into liquid soap. Sales are made in cash to a mixed customer base by going door to door. She plans on making a monthly profit of 17,500 francs CFA which will be used to cover the children's schooling costs.

loans.use: to purchase soaps to sell

loans.name: Danaya Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe DANAYA est composé de femmes mariées qui ont en moyenne 35 ans et 4 enfants. Elles vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles dans le village de TONGA commune de Wacoro
préfecture de Dioila, Région de Koulikoro (deuxième région administrative de la République du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d’amitié. Elles font le commerce, d’arachide, de céréales, du savon, de condiments, de la farine cuite. Les femmes du groupe DANAYA sont à leur troisième prêt solidaire. Dans le but de satisfaire la demande énorme de la clientèle, elles font recours à SORO YIRIWASO. 
Pour des raisons sociales, la cliente MARIAM  la deuxième personne à partir de la droite dans le rang debout est une vendeuse de grain d’arachide dans le village de Tonga depuis plus de deux ans, chose qu’elle a apprise avec ses parents. Elle compte acheter  125kg d’arachide non décortiqué. L’arachide sera décortiquée pour être vendue en détail à la maison ou au marché à une clientèle mixte. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 10 000FCFA. Ce bénéfice sera utilisé dans les dépenses familiales.
texts.en:
The group DANAYA is composed of married women, who average 35 years of age and 4 children each. They all live in traditional families in the village of TONGA, in Commune de Wacoro, Préfecture de Dioila, Région de Koulikoro (2nd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The women know one another through ties of kinship, community, and friendship. They do commerce in peanuts, grains, soap, condiments, and 'farine cuite'. 

The women of the group DANAYA are on their third solidarity loan. To satisfy the enormous customer demand, they turn to the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso. 

For societal reasons, this client, MARIAM, the second person standing from the right, has been a vendor of peanuts in the village of Tonga for over two years. It is a business she learned from her parents. She intends to purchase 125 kg of unshelled peanuts, which will be shelled to be sold retail to a mixed customer base at the house or at the market. She plans on making a monthly profit of 10,000 francs CFA which will be used to cover family expenses.

loans.use: to purchase peanuts

loans.name: Lilia Sarahi

texts.es:
La señora Lilia Sarahi  de 27  años de edad, es madre soltera  tiene  un hijo que depende de ella, es soltera vive en casa de un familiar en una comunidad de  San Lorenzo al sur de Honduras.
Doña Lilia Sarahi se dedica desde hace 03 años  al negocio de venta de abarrotería y todo lo relacionado a la venta de abarrotería, sus clientes le prefieren por su buen surtido en su pulpera, es una mujer sola que está luchando por salir adelante con su familia.
Doña Lilia Sarahi está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de frescos, pollo, embutidos, maíz, leche, jugos, detergentes, carnes y pescado seco ya que viene la semana santa y desea surtir su negocio para atender mejor a sus clientes.
Doña Lilia Sarahi con el apoyo  de este préstamo incrementara sus ventas y sus ingresos y está muy contenta, su sueño es tener su propia casa y un buen negocio.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Enero  del 2014.
texts.en:
Lilia Sarahi, 27 years old, is a single mother. She has a son who depends on her. She is single and lives in a family member's house in a community in San Lorenzo in the south of Honduras.

For 3 years, Lilia Sarahi has had a business selling groceries and everything related to groceries. Her customers prefer her because her store is well-stocked. She is a woman alone who is fighting to move forward with her family.

Lilia Sarahi is asking for the loan to buy drinks, chicken, sausage, corn, milk, juice, detergent, meat, and dried fish, since Holy Week is coming and she wants to stock her business in order to be able to better attend to her customers.

Lilia Sarahi, with the support of this loan, will increase her sales and her income, and she is very happy. Her dream is to have her own house and a good business.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - January 2014

loans.use: to buy drinks, chicken, sausage, corn, milk, juice, detergent, meat, and dried fish for her business

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan de 24 años de edad, estudio hasta cuarto grado de estudio, es albañil y su esposa ama de casa, él con un poco de experiencia en el negocio de comida y vive en el lugar ideal para poner este tipo de negocio y ha decidió hacerlo.

Tiene un cafetín que por unos 8 meses, le ha dado resultado, él aprendió este tipo de negocio mientras trabajaba para otra persona y decidió poner en práctica su experiencia.

Porque el lugar donde lo tiene ubicado, es cerca del instituto y todos los estudiantes pasan a comer algo porque su cuñado tiene un cyber en el mismo local, es un lugar amplio donde los clientes pueden sentirse cómodos.

El préstamo que esta esta solicitando, es para comprar insumos para elaborar más comida y bebidas para vender.  

En vista de que cuenta con el equipo necesario para desarrollarlo, sueña con que sus hijos estudien y sean profesionales y sabe que de esta forma podrá ayudarlo con el estudio.
texts.en:
Juan, 24 years old, studied through the fourth grade. He is a construction worker and his wife is a housewife. He has a little experience in the food business and lives in an ideal location to start this type of business, and he decided to do it.

He has a small cafe that in 8 months has worked out for him. He learned this type of business while he worked for another person and he decided to put his experience into practice.

Because of where he located the business, it is close to the school, and all the students pass by to eat something because his brother-in-law has a cyber cafe on the same premises. It is a large place where the customers can feel comfortable.

The loan that he is requesting is to buy supplies to make more food and drinks to sell.

In view of the fact that he has the necessary tools to make it happen, he dreams that his children will study and be professionals, and he knows that in this way he can help them with their studies.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make more food and drinks to sell

loans.name: Shahina

texts.en:
Shahina belongs to a poor family, living with her spouse and five children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. 

Her son is a blacksmith. He manufactures the iron accessories for doors and windows which are used on houses. He has been providing door-to-door services to weld the broken accessories, as well. 

A few days ago, his welding plant has become out of order due to overheating and it needs to be replaced with a new one. He wants to buy a new welding plant, but he does not have money due to a lot of household expenses. 

Therefore, Shahina requested a loan from BRAC Pakistan, who is an active field partner of Kiva, so that her son would be able to buy a welding plant for manufacturing.

loans.use: to buy a welding plant, soldering rods, welding rods, etc. for her son's business.

loans.name: Vann

texts.en: Vann is 44 years old. She is a married woman with four children in Kampong Speu Province. She is a housewife and her husband runs a business buying and selling cows. One of her children works at a computer store. Both of them can earn USD 25.33 per day. Now she would like to apply for loan of USD 600 for buying a cow in order to get benefit from selling it. She hopes with the increased income she can renovate her house and her kid can enter university.

loans.use: to buy cows in order to get benefit from selling

loans.name: Carlos Dario
